programme.title: Mój kraj taki piękny
programme.desc: W Polsce trwa spór pomiędzy dwoma ugrupowaniami - narodowcami i ich przeciwnikami. Grzegorz Paprzycki dokumentuje przebieg tych potyczek. Pojawia się w samym środku wydarzeń, podczas których niejednokrotnie dochodzi do aktów przemocy. Film stanowi subiektywne spojrzenie na konflikt, który toczy się na polskich ulicach. Za swój obraz reżyser otrzymał Złotego Lajkonika na Krakowskim Festiwalu Filmowym.

programme.title: Klub piłkarski Nefta
Nefta Football Club
programme.desc: W tunezyjskiej wiosce dzieci grają w piłkę nożną na pustkowiach. Tymczasem Abdallah (Mohamed Ali) i Mohamed (Eltayef Dhaoui) spotykają osła ze słuchawkami na uszach i torbami pełnymi białego proszku na plecach. Dwaj młodzi bracia postanawiają przynieść bagaż do swojej wioski.

programme.title: Easy Virtue
Wojna domowa
Easy Virtue
programme.desc:
Easy Virtue: Directed by Stephan Elliott. With Jessica Biel, Ben Barnes, Kristin Scott Thomas, Colin Firth. A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0808244/","name":"Easy Virtue","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmViYjQ0YTUtMjNmZi00NTI4LWEwYTgtYTllNTY4YjRlYzNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTcwNjUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0808244/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pedrothefish"},"dateCreated":"2008-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Easy Virtue - easy on the eyes - a charming and crafted film","reviewBody":"It is not uncommon in a film to see British "stiff upper lip" challenged and outflanked by an outsider - normally an American. As a Brit you learn to put aside any feelings of protectiveness and sensitivity and try to give the film it's fair credit when such a story is presented to you.

In the case of this film - Easy Virtue - this is not difficult to do as it is a well acted gem of a period piece that overcomes any of the initial worries about stereotypes and charms and amuses all the way through.

Kirstin Scott Thomas is superb as the glacial matriarch, Colin Firth detached and louche as her distant husband, Jessica Biel believable as the breath of fresh air ( gust of cold wind ) introduced into the family by the eager but naive son.

Kris Marshall gives an amusing performance as the world weary - seen it all butler and as a whole this is a good enjoyable film.

Taken as it is from a Noel Coward play, I am not sufficiently qualifies to comment on how much , or little, the film has changed the spirit of the play - I suspect not a lot as Mr Coward delighted in ridiculing the sensibilities of the British gentry and if the stiff upper lip is going to be ridiculed by anyone better that it is a Brit !!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21026,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-11-07","keywords":"fox hunt,dysfunctional family,american abroad,newlywed couple,estate","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Easy Virtue","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4286186265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3NjY5ODY1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3NjY5ODY1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Englishman (Barnes) brings his glamorous American bride (Biel) home to meet his family, and she arrives like a blast from the future, blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1602660/","name":"Ben Barnes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000218/","name":"Kristin Scott Thomas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254632/","name":"Stephan Elliott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040024/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018857/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112971/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254632/","name":"Stephan Elliott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0423364/","name":"Sheridan Jobbins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002021/","name":"Noël Coward"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rams
Barany
Rams

A decades-long feud between two sheep farming brothers comes to a head when disaster strikes their flocks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8737608/","name":"Rams","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzU0YzE3NmItOTA4YS00NjBjLTg2MDMtNjc0NmU3MTdjMGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjEwMzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decades-long feud between two sheep farming brothers comes to a head when disaster strikes their flocks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8737608/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xstal"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ramifications of a Remake...","reviewBody":"Always a risk, reformulating an already impressive film, in this case from Icelandic into an English. programme.title: Memory: The Origins of Alien
Wspomnienia: Geneza „Obcego”
Memory: The Origins of Alien
programme.desc:
Memory: The Origins of Alien: Directed by Alexandre O. Philippe. With Bijan Aalam, Tim Boxell, Axelle Carolyn, Veronica Cartwright. An in-depth voyage into the sci-fi film "Alien" with the visionary filmmakers who created it. See how one of the most terrifying movies of all time came to life 40 years ago, inspired by ancient mythology and our universal fears." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8974964/","name":"Memory: The Origins of Alien","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjZWZhOWUtMGFkMS00NGRhLThmN2EtNmZlMTRkOWRlMzQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDExMzMxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An in-depth voyage into the sci-fi film "Alien" with the visionary filmmakers who created it. See how one of the most terrifying movies of all time came to life 40 years ago, inspired by ancient mythology and our universal fears.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8974964/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Last Man"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"I want to go back to the old freezerinos after seeing this documentary","reviewBody":"Imagine the horror of a feminist dissection of the movie in which one of the speakers condescendingly infers that the creators of the movie were actually making a subconscious statement about oppressive patriarchal society without even knowing!

Imagine the audacity it takes to say that artist like Scott, O'Bannon and Giger were actually unaware of their own creative process and subconsciously succumbed to their male guilt.

The decision that this angle is relevant to this movie was wrong and it made the documentary naive, shallow and obtuse. No wonder Ridley Scott wanted nothing to do with it.

Shame really, I liked the bit about Francis Bacon.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2665,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Documentary","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"francis bacon,reenactment,facehugger,film history,film making","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3283468057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlhMzA2NGMtYWUyNC00YjE5LWIwZWEtMzQ2ODkyN2M5ZWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlhMzA2NGMtYWUyNC00YjE5LWIwZWEtMzQ2ODkyN2M5ZWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"The untold origin story behind Ridley Scott's 'Alien' - rooted in Greek and Egyptian mythologies, underground comics, the art of Francis Bacon, and the dark visions of Dan O'Bannon and H.R. Giger. A contemplation on the symbiotic collaborative process of movie-making, the power of myth, and our collective unconscious."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3865525/","name":"Bijan Aalam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101521/","name":"Tim Boxell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2130745/","name":"Axelle Carolyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1465431/","name":"Alexandre O. Philippe"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0253327/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0368845/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537957/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1465431/","name":"Alexandre O. Philippe"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nine to Five
Od dziewiątej do piątej
Nine to Five
programme.desc:
Nine to Five: Directed by Colin Higgins. With Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Dolly Parton, Dabney Coleman. Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0080319/","name":"Nine to Five","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmVkMDZhZmUtNmIxMy00YzY0LTg0NTUtYmViODJmMjU4ZDNjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0080319/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"edwagreen"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"9 to 5-Work Was Never This Much Fun ***","reviewBody":"No question that this is a very funny movie thanks to the gifted performances of Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Dabney Coleman and Dolly Parton. Parton's Oscar worthy song 9 to 5 immediately captures a positive mood in this tale of 3 women who gang up on their miserable boss who has subjected them to sexism in every sense of the word.

The real surprise in this film is Fonda's performance. She goes from a woman who acts and dresses as if she is a spinster teacher to one who is quite hip.

There are some silly moments when the 3 women imagine how they will get rid of boss Dabney Coleman. The mix up at the hospital, though inane, is needed to keep the story going.

A wonderful film depicting the changes of roles of women in the workplace, changing conventional ways of doing things in the office, and a marvelous cat and mouse relationship made by the women and Coleman to get the goods on each other","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31388,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1980-12-19","keywords":"workplace,female protagonist,friendship between women,revenge against boss,1980s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi39173913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwOGRmM2QtNzZlMS00OGJlLThmZWMtZDhhMjQ4MWY5ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwOGRmM2QtNzZlMS00OGJlLThmZWMtZDhhMjQ4MWY5ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000404/","name":"Jane Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005499/","name":"Lily Tomlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000573/","name":"Dolly Parton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383359/","name":"Colin Higgins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059553/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720334/","name":"Patricia Resnick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383359/","name":"Colin Higgins"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu
I znowu zgrzeszyliśmy, dobry Boże!
Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?
programme.desc: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?: Directed by Philippe de Chauveron. With Christian Clavier, Chantal Lauby, Ary Abittan, Medi Sadoun. Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6556670/","name":"Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ0MTRiNmUtYTAyYi00NGViLWExYjEtYzQwZWEyZWFmMDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6556670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonimanganelli"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I love french comedies","reviewBody":"The humour obviously might be not everybodys cup of tea, but I love the s.o.h. of french comedies and especially of this director. In this sequel the actors are really hilarous again. programme.title: Bandits
Włamanie na śniadanie
Bandits
programme.desc: Bandits: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Troy Garity. Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0219965/","name":"Bandits","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMzA3OTI3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjU0ODM3._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0219965/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"roaddreamin"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Last Big Score","reviewBody":"The story of two unlikely bank robbers, a sexy accomplice, and a would-be movie stunt man who come together for one last big score. The story is complex enough to keep your attention right up until the surprise ending. Beyond that, though, this is an ensemble character study with four wonderful actors and it is a pleasure to watch them work. Bruce Willis is a tough guy with a believable sensitive side. Billy Bob Thornton is a hypochondriac with a penchant for making trivial observations at extremely critical times. Billy Bob enjoys doing different characters and this is a memorable one. Cate Blanchett is a beautiful woman running from a failed marriage who falls in love with both men. Troy Garity is a cowboy stunt man whose lapses in judgment are made forgivable by his love for his work. This is, for Garity, a very different character from role in "Barbershop". The movie is beautifully filmed in interesting places and there are even a few classy automobiles around. If you enjoy a good story, some action, and good actors working well together, I recommend that you rent this one."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-10-12","keywords":"cousin cousin relationship,reference to bonnie tyler,escape from prison,television star,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2371337753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036225/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679037/","name":"Harley Peyton"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Incident at Loch Ness
Incydent w Loch Ness
Incident at Loch Ness
programme.desc:
Incident at Loch Ness: Directed by Zak Penn. With Werner Herzog, Kitana Baker, Gabriel Beristain, Russell Williams II. A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0374639/","name":"Incident at Loch Ness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2OTUwMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzA4MDcyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374639/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pdx3525"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Werner Herzog Does Comedy","reviewBody":"Who knew that Werner Herzog  the director of "Aguirre: the Wrath of God", "Fitzcarraldo", and other weighty dramas -- could do comedy? Herzog proves it here in Zak Penn's terrific send-up of "the making of the movie" documentary.

"Incident at Loch" purports to document a film Herzog sets out to make in Scotland about the Loch Ness monster. Overseeing the production is Penn, a successful screenwriter. Along for the ride are a famous cinematographer, an Academy award winning sound man, a Playboy model, and a radio controlled six-foot "Nessie." 

Penn puts it all together in a clever, inventive way. The result is one of the most original  and funniest  movies of the year.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2004-09-17","keywords":"inverness scotland,fake cryptozoologist,wonderland avenue los angeles,year 2003,boat engine","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001348/","name":"Werner Herzog"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128564/","name":"Kitana Baker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075244/","name":"Gabriel Beristain"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156805/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

Herzog proves it here in Zak Penn's terrific send-up of "the making of the movie" documentary.

"Incident at Loch" purports to document a film Herzog sets out to make in Scotland about the Loch Ness monster. Overseeing the production is Penn, a successful screenwriter. Along for the ride are a famous cinematographer, an Academy award winning sound man, a Playboy model, and a radio controlled six-foot "Nessie." 

Penn puts it all together in a clever, inventive way. programme.title: Easy Virtue
Wojna domowa
Easy Virtue
programme.desc:
Easy Virtue: Directed by Stephan Elliott. With Jessica Biel, Ben Barnes, Kristin Scott Thomas, Colin Firth. A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0808244/","name":"Easy Virtue","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmViYjQ0YTUtMjNmZi00NTI4LWEwYTgtYTllNTY4YjRlYzNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTcwNjUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0808244/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pedrothefish"},"dateCreated":"2008-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Easy Virtue - easy on the eyes - a charming and crafted film","reviewBody":"It is not uncommon in a film to see British "stiff upper lip" challenged and outflanked by an outsider - normally an American. As a Brit you learn to put aside any feelings of protectiveness and sensitivity and try to give the film it's fair credit when such a story is presented to you.

In the case of this film - Easy Virtue - this is not difficult to do as it is a well acted gem of a period piece that overcomes any of the initial worries about stereotypes and charms and amuses all the way through.

Kirstin Scott Thomas is superb as the glacial matriarch, Colin Firth detached and louche as her distant husband, Jessica Biel believable as the breath of fresh air ( gust of cold wind ) introduced into the family by the eager but naive son.

Kris Marshall gives an amusing performance as the world weary - seen it all butler and as a whole this is a good enjoyable film.

Taken as it is from a Noel Coward play, I am not sufficiently qualifies to comment on how much , or little, the film has changed the spirit of the play - I suspect not a lot as Mr Coward delighted in ridiculing the sensibilities of the British gentry and if the stiff upper lip is going to be ridiculed by anyone better that it is a Brit !!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21026,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-11-07","keywords":"fox hunt,dysfunctional family,american abroad,newlywed couple,estate","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Easy Virtue","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4286186265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3NjY5ODY1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3NjY5ODY1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Englishman (Barnes) brings his glamorous American bride (Biel) home to meet his family, and she arrives like a blast from the future, blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1602660/","name":"Ben Barnes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000218/","name":"Kristin Scott Thomas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254632/","name":"Stephan Elliott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040024/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018857/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112971/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254632/","name":"Stephan Elliott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0423364/","name":"Sheridan Jobbins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002021/","name":"Noël Coward"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Memory: The Origins of Alien: Directed by Alexandre O. Philippe. With Bijan Aalam, Tim Boxell, Axelle Carolyn, Veronica Cartwright. programme.title: Nine to Five
Od dziewiątej do piątej
Nine to Five
programme.desc:
Nine to Five: Directed by Colin Higgins. With Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Dolly Parton, Dabney Coleman. Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0080319/","name":"Nine to Five","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmVkMDZhZmUtNmIxMy00YzY0LTg0NTUtYmViODJmMjU4ZDNjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0080319/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"edwagreen"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"9 to 5-Work Was Never This Much Fun ***","reviewBody":"No question that this is a very funny movie thanks to the gifted performances of Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Dabney Coleman and Dolly Parton. Parton's Oscar worthy song 9 to 5 immediately captures a positive mood in this tale of 3 women who gang up on their miserable boss who has subjected them to sexism in every sense of the word.

The real surprise in this film is Fonda's performance. She goes from a woman who acts and dresses as if she is a spinster teacher to one who is quite hip.

There are some silly moments when the 3 women imagine how they will get rid of boss Dabney Coleman. The mix up at the hospital, though inane, is needed to keep the story going.

A wonderful film depicting the changes of roles of women in the workplace, changing conventional ways of doing things in the office, and a marvelous cat and mouse relationship made by the women and Coleman to get the goods on each other","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31388,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1980-12-19","keywords":"workplace,female protagonist,friendship between women,revenge against boss,1980s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi39173913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwOGRmM2QtNzZlMS00OGJlLThmZWMtZDhhMjQ4MWY5ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwOGRmM2QtNzZlMS00OGJlLThmZWMtZDhhMjQ4MWY5ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000404/","name":"Jane Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005499/","name":"Lily Tomlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000573/","name":"Dolly Parton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383359/","name":"Colin Higgins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059553/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720334/","name":"Patricia Resnick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383359/","name":"Colin Higgins"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu
I znowu zgrzeszyliśmy, dobry Boże!
Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?
programme.desc: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?: Directed by Philippe de Chauveron. With Christian Clavier, Chantal Lauby, Ary Abittan, Medi Sadoun. Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6556670/","name":"Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ0MTRiNmUtYTAyYi00NGViLWExYjEtYzQwZWEyZWFmMDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6556670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonimanganelli"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I love french comedies","reviewBody":"The humour obviously might be not everybodys cup of tea, but I love the s.o.h. of french comedies and especially of this director. In this sequel the actors are really hilarous again. Of course it is not as great as the very successful first part from five years ago but it is definitely enjoyale enough to be worth watching for everybody who likes french comedies. programme.title: Bandits
Włamanie na śniadanie
Bandits
programme.desc: Bandits: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Troy Garity. Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0219965/","name":"Bandits","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMzA3OTI3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjU0ODM3._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0219965/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"roaddreamin"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Last Big Score","reviewBody":"The story of two unlikely bank robbers, a sexy accomplice, and a would-be movie stunt man who come together for one last big score. The story is complex enough to keep your attention right up until the surprise ending. Beyond that, though, this is an ensemble character study with four wonderful actors and it is a pleasure to watch them work. Bruce Willis is a tough guy with a believable sensitive side. Billy Bob Thornton is a hypochondriac with a penchant for making trivial observations at extremely critical times. Billy Bob enjoys doing different characters and this is a memorable one. Cate Blanchett is a beautiful woman running from a failed marriage who falls in love with both men. Troy Garity is a cowboy stunt man whose lapses in judgment are made forgivable by his love for his work. This is, for Garity, a very different character from role in "Barbershop". The movie is beautifully filmed in interesting places and there are even a few classy automobiles around. If you enjoy a good story, some action, and good actors working well together, I recommend that you rent this one."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-10-12","keywords":"cousin cousin relationship,reference to bonnie tyler,escape from prison,television star,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2371337753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036225/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679037/","name":"Harley Peyton"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0219965, Title: Bandits, --- Description: Bandits: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Troy Garity. Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0219965/","name":"Bandits","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMzA3OTI3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjU0ODM3._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0219965/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"roaddreamin","dateCreated":"2006-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Last Big Score","reviewBody":"The story of two unlikely bank robbers, a sexy accomplice, and a would-be movie stunt man who come together for one last big score. The story is complex enough to keep your attention right up until the surprise ending. Beyond that, though, this is an ensemble character study with four wonderful actors and it is a pleasure to watch them work. Bruce Willis is a tough guy with a believable sensitive side. Billy Bob Thornton is a hypochondriac with a penchant for making trivial observations at extremely critical times. Billy Bob enjoys doing different characters and this is a memorable one. Cate Blanchett is a beautiful woman running from a failed marriage who falls in love with both men. Troy Garity is a cowboy stunt man whose lapses in judgment are made forgivable by his love for his work. This is, for Garity, a very different character from role in "Barbershop". The movie is beautifully filmed in interesting places and there are even a few classy automobiles around. If you enjoy a good story, some action, and good actors working well together, I recommend that you rent this one.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-10-12","keywords":"cousin cousin relationship,reference to bonnie tyler,escape from prison,television star,home invasion","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2371337753","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MWRjMTktOTIwNC00ZjczLTkwNDgtNzk4MDdjOTU5NWZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036225/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022018/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679037/","name":"Harley Peyton"],"duration":"PT2H3M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Death Grip
W uścisku śmierci
Death Grip
programme.desc: Death Grip: Directed by Eric Jacobus. With Eric Jacobus, Nathan Hoskins, Johnny Yong Bosch, Rebecca Ahn. In an effort to set his life straight, Kenny Zemacus checks his autistic brother Mark out of the care home where he's spent the past fifteen years since their mother's death. When Kenny reluctantly brings Mark on a last minute museum catering gig, Mark unwittingly entangles them in a dangerous heist involving the museum's showpiece-the Silver Coin of Judas-and a murderous satanic cult known as The Knights of Judas. The two brothers are propelled into the cult's demonic world where they must fight for their lives and face the depths of their own dark past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2120128/","name":"Death Grip","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwMzA0ODkyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDEwMjkwOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In an effort to set his life straight, Kenny Zemacus checks his autistic brother Mark out of the care home where he's spent the past fifteen years since their mother's death. When Kenny reluctantly brings Mark on a last minute museum","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2120128/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ipkevin-561-135380"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding fight scenes, odd tone","reviewBody":"First things first: The fight scenes in Death Grip are outstanding. Do you remember how complex, exciting, and fun Jackie Chan's fight scenes were in the late '80s before he became obsessed with stunts and running away? Well, it's like Eric Jacobus and the Stunt People picked up where Jackie fell off and have been developing that style all this time. They've taken that same punchy spirit from 80s Hong Kong fight choreography, updated it with modern camera techniques and editing, and put their own violent spin on it. You could make the case that no other group in the world create fight scenes as well as The Stunt People right now.\n\nHaving said that, Death Grip has issues with pacing and tone. Like classic 1980s HK cinema, the story veers from comedy to action to heavy melodrama to outrageous violence. But unlike those HK films, the pace is slow and leaden. Characters often pause and react slowly for no reason, making you want to yell at them to hurry up. The photography (while stylish) seems under-lit and the music is constantly ominous, giving the whole affair a gloomy vibe that detracts from the story's lighthearted tone and absurd events. Also, the fights are too few and far between and when they do come, the lighting is so dark that they can be hard to appreciate fully. It's infuriating to struggle to see those magnificent fights, then switch to the Blu-Ray's "extra" fights and see how well-lit yet still stylish they are. The brighter lighting and colours even give the fights an extra pop of energy! Regardless, Jacobus' likable underdog charisma pulls the film together and his epic battle with Johnny Bosch makes the film a must-see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":146,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"2012-07-01","keywords":"broken nose,violence,martial arts,three word title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2009674/","name":"Eric Jacobus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3766465/","name":"Nathan Hoskins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097765/","name":"Johnny Yong Bosch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2009674/","name":"Eric Jacobus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0364425/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2009674/","name":"Eric Jacobus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3642838/","name":"Pete Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister
Łowcy burz
Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister
programme.desc: Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister: Directed by Mark Sobel. With Kelly McGillis, Wolf Larson, Liz Torres, Adrian Zmed. When a tornado takes her meteorologist husband's life, his wife and colleague devotes her own life to prove his theories that violent twisters are predictable." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0158242/","name":"Storm Chasers: Revenge of the Twister","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODY4NzE2MjkwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY5OTAyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a tornado takes her meteorologist husband's life, his wife and colleague devotes her own life to prove his theories that violent twisters are predictable.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0158242/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FoxWithaCamera"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Definitely Different","reviewBody":"This movie was certainly a unique take on the Twister theme. My question was; How did Kelly McGillis end up in no-budget, made for TV silliness. I could've expected her in a Lifetime Movie of the Week, but this seemed way off target for her. Admittedly, she did do a good job for the role she was given. Along those lines, it was a bit surprising and somewhat funny to see James MacArthur (Danno from Hawaii Five-0) in this movie. The movie itself is not Oscar material by any stretch of the imagination. But if you set your standards low enough, it's actually very amusing. It actually would've worked well as a radio program, if those type of programs were still done. If you like to watch movies that have no redeeming value other than a good laugh, this is a must.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":478,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1998-05-17","keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,female protagonist,hurricane,storm","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000534/","name":"Kelly McGillis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0489112/","name":"Wolf Larson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005500/","name":"Liz Torres"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811764/","name":"Mark Sobel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015207/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045895/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167736/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0944034/","name":"Jeffrey Wynne"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Admittedly, she did do a good job for the role she was given. Along those lines, it was a bit surprising and somewhat funny to see James MacArthur (Danno from Hawaii Five-0) in this movie. The movie itself is not Oscar material by any stretch of the imagination. But if you set your standards low enough, it's actually very amusing. It actually would've worked well as a radio program, if those type of programs were still done. If you like to watch movies that have no redeeming value other than a good laugh, this is a must.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":478,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1998-05-17","keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,female protagonist,hurricane,storm","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000534/","name":"Kelly McGillis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0489112/","name":"Wolf Larson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005500/","name":"Liz Torres"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811764/","name":"Mark Sobel"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015207/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045895/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167736/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0944034/","name":"Jeffrey Wynne"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Meg
Megalodon
programme.desc:
The Meg: Directed by Jon Turteltaub. With Jason Statham, Bingbing Li, Rainn Wilson, Cliff Curtis. A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4779682/","name":"The Meg","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMGRmODYtM2NkYS00ZGRlLWE1MWItYjI1MzIwNjQwN2RiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4779682/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AverageJoesDriveInPodcast"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun theater-going experience!","reviewBody":"I will be upfront with anyone who hasn't watched this yet. Mindset-wise if you go in thinking more along the lines of Deep Blue Sea rather than JAWS you'll probably have a good time. If you want serious, deep storylines and Oscar-caliber performances you probably should avoid it because this isn't it. Also on that note, why the hell would you go see this movie in the first place if you want that?

This movie is just stupid fun with tons of funny moments. The comedy aspect of it actually caught me off guard. I expected a few funny moments here and there like most films of this ilk, but this is just straight up funny throughout. There are plenty of grandiose action sequences. A character you just flat out hate because he's such an atypical ass-hat and some beautiful CGI. The film itself is very well shot and I even had a hard time telling whether the FXs were practical or CGI in spots. They blended stuff together well. I thought the acting was solid for what this film is. It's about what I expected. 

Like anything, there were a few things here and there that could have been better. But, none of those things were enough to hinder my enjoyment of it. I personally would have liked to see it be a tad bit gorier. I think that might have pushed this up a notch especially with the type of story this. On the other hand, that's more of a preference than an actual hindrance type thing. 

This was exactly what I wanted out of a Summer Blockbuster style film. It's a fun theater-going experience. It's the type of movie you want to see on the big screen with a great sound system. What I would consider a perfect popcorn flick.

My Rating: 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163112,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2018-08-10","keywords":"love interest,prehistoric animal,based on novel,shark,creature feature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3497834521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNiNzMyZWYtMWQ3NS00NjU3LWI4ZTItY2MyODk5OGE4MmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNiNzMyZWYtMWQ3NS00NjU3LWI4ZTItY2MyODk5OGE4MmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"A deep-sea submersible -- part of an international undersea observation program -- has been attacked by a massive creature, previously thought to be extinct, and now lies disabled at the bottom of the deepest trench in the Pacific ... with its crew trapped inside. With time running out, expert deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor (Jason Statham) is recruited by a visionary Chinese oceanographer (Winston Chao), against the wishes of his daughter Suyin (Li Bingbing), to save the crew -- and the ocean itself -- from this unstoppable threat: a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark known as the Megalodon. What no one could have imagined is that, years before, Taylor had encountered this same terrifying creature. Now, teamed with Suyin, he must confront his fears and risk his own life to save everyone trapped below"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508356/","name":"Bingbing Li"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933988/","name":"Rainn Wilson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005509/","name":"Jon Turteltaub"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0279776/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0541924/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1212988/","name":"Dean Georgaris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388377/","name":"Jon Hoeber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388375/","name":"Erich Hoeber"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Najlepsi reżyserzy Hollywood 2
programme.desc: W kolejnych odcinkach serii zaprezentowane zostaną sylwetki największych hollywoodzkich reżyserów.

programme.title: Pakt z diabłem
programme.desc: Przystojny Louis (Ethan Erickson) pracuje w znanym studiu fotograficznym prowadzonym przez Bae (Jennifer Nitsch). Jego urodę dostrzega menedżer Henry (Malcolm McDowell) i zaprasza go na sesję. Za jego namową chłopak przyjmuje pseudonim artystyczny Dorian, na cześć tytułowej postaci z powieści Oscara Wilde'a "Portret Doriana Graya". Zaczyna odnosić liczne sukcesy. Po kilku latach Louis odkrywa, że twarz na przedstawiającym go portrecie starzeje się zamiast niego, podobnie jak w książce.

programme.title: The Craft
Szkoła czarownic
The Craft
programme.desc:
The Craft: Directed by Andrew Fleming. With Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell, Rachel True. A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0115963/","name":"The Craft","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTBkMWE1NGItZTgxMi00ZTE0LWIzZjAtNzQ5ZGZlZTQxN2EwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0115963/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RobertF87"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting and Entertaining Film","reviewBody":"This is a very entertaining blend of supernatural thriller and teen movie. Sarah (played by Robin Tunney) is the new girl at a Catholic shool in Los Angeles where she meets a group of girls (Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell and Rachel True) who dabble in witchcraft. When Sarah joins the group they discover that they have genuine power and start using it to sort out their personal problems, until the group's leader Nacy (Balk) starts taking it too far.

The film is well-made and several shades darker than the average teen movie. The cast are all very good, especially Fairuza Balk who easily steals the film with her part.

The film's portrayal of witchcraft is a bit more interesting than the standard Hollywood portrayal, and it certainly doesn't represent it as essentially "evil", which makes a nice change. However, as always, this is Hollywood so many liberties will have been taken with genuine wiccan practices.

The film is worth a look, however. The only thing that lets it down is the overblown climax.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88129,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"1996-05-03","keywords":"witch,witchcraft,teenage witch,bully comeuppance,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Craft","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi76463897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU1ZmJhMzEtMGIwZi00NWEyLTk0ZmYtNWQyYTk2NDEwOWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU1ZmJhMzEtMGIwZi00NWEyLTk0ZmYtNWQyYTk2NDEwOWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000677/","name":"Robin Tunney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000103/","name":"Fairuza Balk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281598/","name":"Andrew Fleming"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093794/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276823/","name":"Peter Filardi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281598/","name":"Andrew Fleming"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0115963, Title: The Craft, --- Description: The Craft: Directed by Andrew Fleming. With Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell, Rachel True. A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0115963/","name":"The Craft","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTBkMWE1NGItZTgxMi00ZTE0LWIzZjAtNzQ5ZGZlZTQxN2EwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0115963/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"RobertF87","dateCreated":"2005-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting and Entertaining Film","reviewBody":"This is a very entertaining blend of supernatural thriller and teen movie. Sarah (played by Robin Tunney) is the new girl at a Catholic shool in Los Angeles where she meets a group of girls (Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell and Rachel True) who dabble in witchcraft. When Sarah joins the group they discover that they have genuine power and start using it to sort out their personal problems, until the group's leader Nacy (Balk) starts taking it too far.

The film is well-made and several shades darker than the average teen movie. The cast are all very good, especially Fairuza Balk who easily steals the film with her part.

The film's portrayal of witchcraft is a bit more interesting than the standard Hollywood portrayal, and it certainly doesn't represent it as essentially "evil", which makes a nice change. However, as always, this is Hollywood so many liberties will have been taken with genuine wiccan practices.

The film is worth a look, however. The only thing that lets it down is the overblown climax.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88129,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"1996-05-03","keywords":"witch,witchcraft,teenage witch,bully comeuppance,friendship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Craft","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi76463897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU1ZmJhMzEtMGIwZi00NWEyLTk0ZmYtNWQyYTk2NDEwOWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU1ZmJhMzEtMGIwZi00NWEyLTk0ZmYtNWQyYTk2NDEwOWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000677/","name":"Robin Tunney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000103/","name":"Fairuza Balk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281598/","name":"Andrew Fleming"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093794/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276823/","name":"Peter Filardi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281598/","name":"Andrew Fleming"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nemo
Był sobie sen
Nemo
programme.desc:
Nemo: Directed by Arnaud Sélignac. With Seth Kibel, Jason Connery, Mathilda May, Nipsey Russell. A young boy imagines being in a tale he's about to hear. In this magical world he encounters many famous characters from other tales, aliens and other beings and, of course, a beautiful princess." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087784/","name":"Nemo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NzIwMTgwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjIyMzMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy imagines being in a tale he's about to hear. In this magical world he encounters many famous characters from other tales, aliens and other beings and, of course, a beautiful princess.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087784/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blackdeath_sorbet"},"dateCreated":"2016-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dream a little dream","reviewBody":"First this is a totally biased rating of 10/10, simply because I saw this film at such a young age and it stayed with long after I forgot the title. In fact if my father had not come into the room and remarked, 'That's Sean Connery's son," I probably would have never found it again.

The film starts with a boy being told a bedtime story and later that night having a nightmare about his parents dying in a car crash, which jolts him into action.

He runs into an elevator and there he descends into his own Oz. A dream world that looks like a pantomime set and that is populated with several different children's stories archetypes.

The film is a romance more than anything, but one for children and it operates on its own child-like logic. Some things happen just because they do and everything is exaggerated. The heart of it still lingers with me today and that ending, a dream you never want to end.

Probably not for everyone but I love it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"genre":["Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1984-12-12","keywords":"elevator,submarine,fairy tale,surrealism,sword and fantasy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0452157/","name":"Seth Kibel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001064/","name":"Jason Connery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000528/","name":"Mathilda May"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845353/","name":"Arnaud Sélignac"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042201/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047305/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845353/","name":"Arnaud Sélignac"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261260/","name":"Jean-Pierre Esquenazi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0095579/","name":"Telsche Boorman"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Secrets in the Walls
Sekretne ściany
Secrets in the Walls
programme.desc:
Secrets in the Walls: Directed by Christopher Leitch. With Jeri Ryan, Kay Panabaker, Peyton List, Ian Kahn. A mother and her two teenage daughters move into an ancient house in a suburb of Detroit, when it is offered at a very low price." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1559359/","name":"Secrets in the Walls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNTAyNjEwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODkxODU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mother and her two teenage daughters move into an ancient house in a suburb of Detroit, when it is offered at a very low price.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1559359/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Generic ghost fodder","reviewBody":"SECRETS IN THE WALLS is yet more of the same old stuff: a struggling single mother moves into a cheap property with her two teenage daughters and soon finds that they're not alone in the creepy old building. Cue CGI-assisted spirits, a heavy debt of inspiration to the likes of THE RING, DARK WATER and classic ghost stories of old, and a general lack of originality.

Jeri Ryan, once a STAR TREK babe, appears tired and haggard in this made for TV outing that provides absolutely nothing new for genre fans. The scare scenes are well choreographed in advance and anything but frightening, and the bits inbetween the spooks are dull and talky.

The production as a whole suffers from that TV-movie style atmosphere in which everything is played safe and no chances are taken with style or plot twists. You'll guess the outcome from the very beginning and the journey to the end makes for one dull ride.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1520,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-10-24","keywords":"working mom,apparition,medium,mother daughter relationship,single mother","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005394/","name":"Jeri Ryan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0659048/","name":"Kay Panabaker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2572554/","name":"Peyton List"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500609/","name":"Christopher Leitch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180696/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090801/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013824/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1427602/","name":"William Penick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3716185/","name":"Christopher Sey"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
Halloween - 20 lat później
Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc:
Halloween H20: 20 Years Later: Directed by Steve Miner. With Jamie Lee Curtis, Adam Arkin, Michelle Williams, Adam Hann-Byrd. Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120694/","name":"Halloween H20: 20 Years Later","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA3ZjMzZWItNWUyNy00ZmNiLWIwYmYtN2UxNWUwMGY5Yzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RyanCShowers"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Sequel of the Series","reviewBody":""Halloween H20" is the most accomplished sequel of the "Halloween" series, and a film that would deserve a "10" for its potency, conviction, and intelligence if it weren't for a few non-Laurie scenes earlier in the film that feel less than what other films achieved at the time. 

You can't talk about "Halloween H20" without discussing the impact the "Scream" trilogy had on this era in horror cinema. The post-modern references, thrilling and modern style, sexy stars, and heightened feminist protagonists that made the three "Scream" films so successful are borrowed by "Halloween H20" and are used to the film's triumph. 

The single best aspect of "Halloween H20" is Laurie Strode's character development. Though it's a bit more heavy-handed than Sidney in "Scream," it's effective, thorough, and aided by Jamie Lee Curtis' phenomenal, unforgettable portrayal. The last 20 minutes are first-rate 1990s horror. 

"Halloween H20" feels as scary and fresh today as it did in 1998."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71976,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1998-08-05","keywords":"slasher,call the police,private boarding school,faked death,headmistress","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Halloween H20: 20 Years Later","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1408212505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwNmY1MGUtMWM0ZS00NGQyLWE1OTUtMGIxOWZjOWU5YzA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwNmY1MGUtMWM0ZS00NGQyLWE1OTUtMGIxOWZjOWU5YzA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035060/","name":"Adam Arkin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591171/","name":"Steve Miner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091393/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005891/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384185/","name":"Debra Hill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000118/","name":"John Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002526/","name":"Robert Zappia"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

You can't talk about "Halloween H20" without discussing the impact the "Scream" trilogy had on this era in horror cinema. The post-modern references, thrilling and modern style, sexy stars, and heightened feminist protagonists that made the three "Scream" films so successful are borrowed by "Halloween H20" and are used to the film's triumph. 

The single best aspect of "Halloween H20" is Laurie Strode's character development. Though it's a bit more heavy-handed than Sidney in "Scream," it's effective, thorough, and aided by Jamie Lee Curtis' phenomenal, unforgettable portrayal. The last 20 minutes are first-rate 1990s horror.

Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0999913/","name":"Straw Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MTk5ODIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU1MzgyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0999913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kryoung02"},"dateCreated":"2011-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strong cast - sad remake script","reviewBody":"As a fan of Alexander Skarsgård, I really tried to like the movie - but I just couldn't. If the hushed nature of the theater crowed leaving at the end is any indication - they felt the same way. I feel the cast did well with what they had, but the script was lacking in too many ways. Where the 1971 version had tension and excitement, the 2011 version was often boring and all over the place. I often felt like it was Texas Chainsaw Massacre decided to have a get together with Deliverance and Sweet Home Alabama. The whole thing just felt awkward and thrown together. There were only a handful of scenes where the movie actually had my attention - but they were few and far apart and short lived. There were even moments that were so awkward they were actually uncomfortable. I expected so much more with such a classic movie base and wonderful cast - but ultimately it was disappointing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33831,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-09-16","keywords":"rape,sexual humiliation,rape victim,gang rape,panties pulled down","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi174103833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. programme.title: Pit Fighter
Niepokonany
Pit Fighter
programme.desc:
Pit Fighter: Directed by Jesse V. Johnson. With Dominiquie Vandenberg, Steven Bauer, Fernando Carrillo, Stephen Graham. Jack Severino has no memory, all he knows is the brutal sport of Pit Fighting. When his past catches him up, he realizes he is not who he thought he was. For some men must fight for redemption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396096/","name":"Pit Fighter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI4MWYwODAtMWE3MS00ZDg3LWEyM2ItNmYxZGU0MGM2YTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Severino has no memory, all he knows is the brutal sport of Pit Fighting. When his past catches him up, he realizes he is not who he thought he was. For some men must fight for redemption.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396096/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stormruston"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Mona Lisa of B fighter movies, what a ride!","reviewBody":"I went into this one with at best medium expectations,and the first 7 or 8 minutes lived up to this. After that WOW.This movie was nuts,what a great story, I was absolutely riveted by the 2 main characters in this movie..Dominique Vandenberg improved as the movie went on to the point of moving me and Steven Bauer was perfect right from the get-go.

There is allot of violence in this movie, and normally North American Action/Violent movies in the B budget range lack good story's, emotion, and likable characters or even good fights for that mater. This has them all in spades, and on-top of that very stylish and watchable filming and editing in general.

Do you need to know the basic story still? OK. In a nut shell, a man has lost his memory after a big shoot out where he was gravely injured,he was saved and is now "owned" by a "want to get ahead" but nice Mexican (Steven Bauer)and since it turns out the man has fighting skills, that is were they go to make their money.But that is not the story.Just the action. The story is about a fellow who has forgotten his past, and has sort of made up one for himself that is much better then he really was, but still truthful in a twisted way until that past catches up to him.Then it is about redemption and honour.

Great effort,very good movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1154,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"2008-05-23","keywords":"dog fighting,pit fighter,wrestling,wrestler,gangster","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888664/","name":"Dominiquie Vandenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000874/","name":"Steven Bauer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0140488/","name":"Fernando Carrillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425364/","name":"Jesse V. For some men must fight for redemption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396096/","name":"Pit Fighter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI4MWYwODAtMWE3MS00ZDg3LWEyM2ItNmYxZGU0MGM2YTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Severino has no memory, all he knows is the brutal sport of Pit Fighting. When his past catches him up, he realizes he is not who he thought he was. For some men must fight for redemption.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396096/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stormruston","dateCreated":"2005-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Mona Lisa of B fighter movies, what a ride!","reviewBody":"I went into this one with at best medium expectations,and the first 7 or 8 minutes lived up to this. After that WOW.This movie was nuts,what a great story, I was absolutely riveted by the 2 main characters in this movie..Dominique Vandenberg improved as the movie went on to the point of moving me and Steven Bauer was perfect right from the get-go.

There is allot of violence in this movie, and normally North American Action/Violent movies in the B budget range lack good story's, emotion, and likable characters or even good fights for that mater. This has them all in spades, and on-top of that very stylish and watchable filming and editing in general.

Do you need to know the basic story still? OK. In a nut shell, a man has lost his memory after a big shoot out where he was gravely injured,he was saved and is now "owned" by a "want to get ahead" but nice Mexican (Steven Bauer)and since it turns out the man has fighting skills, that is were they go to make their money.But that is not the story.Just the action. The story is about a fellow who has forgotten his past, and has sort of made up one for himself that is much better then he really was, but still truthful in a twisted way until that past catches up to him.Then it is about redemption and honour.

Great effort,very good movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1154,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"2008-05-23","keywords":"dog fighting,pit fighter,wrestling,wrestler,gangster","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888664/","name":"Dominiquie Vandenberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000874/","name":"Steven Bauer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0140488/","name":"Fernando Carrillo"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425364/","name":"Jesse V. Crash Landing
programme.desc: Crash Landing: Directed by Jim Wynorski. With Antonio Sabato Jr., Michael Paré, Brianne Davis, Kevin Dobson. When a hostage situation arises on a private plane with the daughter of a billionaire on board, Major John Masters (Antonio Sabato Jr.) teams up with Captain Williams (Michael Paré) to stop the terrorists and land the plane." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0385622/","name":"Crash Landing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNkMWE5Y2QtZDc3MS00MDBmLWI0MTItZTE4Zjc0NGIxNmZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a hostage situation arises on a private plane with the daughter of a billionaire on board, Major John Masters (Antonio Sabato Jr.) teams up with Captain Williams (Michael Paré) to stop the terrorists and land the plane.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0385622/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"An utter wreck of a movie","reviewBody":"Even if not expecting a huge amount in the first place, you do not expect to see a movie this bad. This was exactly the case with Crash Landing, the only good thing being how well it managed to live up to its title. It is very choppily edited, almost as if the whole movie was made in a desperate rush. The story didn't involve at all, and further disadvantaged by sluggish pacing, too many ridiculous moments to list and the action-like sequences hopelessly contrived. The characters are little more than walking clichés that we learn nothing about and end up hating so much, while the acting is terrible especially from that non-entity Antonio Sabbato Jnr. But if there is anything that fared the absolute worst here, it was the dialogue, it was laughably cringe worthy and the cheese factor is constantly hit right at you. In conclusion, an utter wreck with nothing to redeem it other than the irony of its title. 1/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":864,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-07-09","keywords":"kidnapping,villainess,terrorist,hostage,hurricane","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004645/","name":"Antonio Sabato Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001595/","name":"Michael Paré"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1732403/","name":"Brianne Davis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0691061/","name":"Jim Wynorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091470/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083590/","name":"Paul A. When two freshmen pledges are accepted into the biggest party frat on campus (ALPHA HOUSE), they think they have it all.
