The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc:
The Philadelphia Experiment: Directed by Paul Ziller. With Nicholas Lea, Michael Paré, Ryan Robbins, Emilie Ullerup. In 1943 a secret government cloaking project goes awry vanishing a navy destroyer. In 2012, the destroyer reappears, setting off a series of events threatening to destroy the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2039399/","name":"The Philadelphia Experiment","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2YzZhNDYtZjk2Ny00MTljLWE5Y2ItM2JlMDJmY2QyMzAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzExMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1943 a secret government cloaking project goes awry vanishing a navy destroyer. In 2012, the destroyer reappears, setting off a series of events threatening to destroy the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2039399/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paulgo-74-488063"},"dateCreated":"2012-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fine piece of utter crap","reviewBody":"This is up there with the BEST of them. The best of CRAP that is...it looks like it was written by a 13 year old schoolboy and the editing isn't much better. The actors involved in this must've been damned hard up for cash because their talents are totally wasted on this poor excuse for entertainment.

I'm not going to spoil it because there is nothing to spoil. The studio did a fine job of that all by themselves.

Just don't waste your time. Watch a soapie or go out and hire an old 50's scifi. I'm sure they had a thing called continuity and good editing back then. It seems to be a dying art these days.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2800,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-07-28","keywords":"airplane crash,de 173 uss eldridge,business jet,1923 five dollar silver certificate,coffee shop","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494774/","name":"Nicholas Lea"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001595/","name":"Michael Paré"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0730455/","name":"Ryan Robbins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0263130/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0362708/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1337887/","name":"Andy Briggs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2579139/","name":"David Sanderson"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes
Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes
programme.desc:
Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes: Directed by Jude Gerard Prest. With Yaz Canli, Kai Cofer, Christopher Karl Johnson, Nikki Muller. In the tradition of PARANORMAL ACTIVITY, found footage documents the real life exorcisms of Anneliese Michel, history's most notorious victim of demonic possession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1911533/","name":"Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1MTk5NTE0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQyNTA5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the tradition of PARANORMAL ACTIVITY, found footage documents the real life exorcisms of Anneliese Michel, history's most notorious victim of demonic possession.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1911533/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Platypuschow"},"dateCreated":"2019-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anneliese The Exorcist Tapes: Exploitative","reviewBody":"The Exorcist Tapes is the third movie in the very loose Paranormal Entity/Investigations franchise and is made by infamous production company The Asylum (Who I'm sure I don't need to introduce).

It tells the true story of Anneliese Michel and the case of her supposed exorcism and the two warring factions who tried to decide her fate. The doctors who wanted her to go to a hospital and seek medical treatment and the parents/priests who deemed her possessed and demanded she be subject to an exorcism.

The movie plays out as if it's real footage of the event which I find a tad exploitative and in bad taste considering the true story, what happened and the fate that Anneliese was finally dealt.

In true Paranormal Entity and Asylum tradition the movie looks ugly, has no budget behind it, has a mediocre cast and people behind the camera who must have just graduated amateur film school.

If you want to know the story of Ms.Michel then google it, maybe watch the documentary but leave this nonsense in the cold where it belongs.

The Good:

Nope

The Bad:

Rather bad taste pretending it's real footage based on what actually happened

IMDb data; ttnr: 1911533, Title: Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes, --- Description: Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes: Directed by Jude Gerard Prest. With Yaz Canli, Kai Cofer, Christopher Karl Johnson, Nikki Muller. In the tradition of PARANORMAL ACTIVITY, found footage documents the real life exorcisms of Anneliese Michel, history's most notorious victim of demonic possession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1911533/","name":"Anneliese: The Exorcist Tapes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1MTk5NTE0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQyNTA5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the tradition of PARANORMAL ACTIVITY, found footage documents the real life exorcisms of Anneliese Michel, history's most notorious victim of demonic possession.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1911533/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Platypuschow","dateCreated":"2019-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anneliese The Exorcist Tapes: Exploitative","reviewBody":"The Exorcist Tapes is the third movie in the very loose Paranormal Entity/Investigations franchise and is made by infamous production company The Asylum (Who I'm sure I don't need to introduce).

It tells the true story of Anneliese Michel and the case of her supposed exorcism and the two warring factions who tried to decide her fate. The doctors who wanted her to go to a hospital and seek medical treatment and the parents/priests who deemed her possessed and demanded she be subject to an exorcism.

The movie plays out as if it's real footage of the event which I find a tad exploitative and in bad taste considering the true story, what happened and the fate that Anneliese was finally dealt.

In true Paranormal Entity and Asylum tradition the movie looks ugly, has no budget behind it, has a mediocre cast and people behind the camera who must have just graduated amateur film school.

If you want to know the story of Ms.Michel then google it, maybe watch the documentary but leave this nonsense in the cold where it belongs.

The Good:

Nope

The Bad:

Rather bad taste pretending it's real footage based on what actually happened

Everything is just so poor","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":845,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2011-03-01","keywords":"found footage,demonic possession,exorcism,documentary style,loosely based on real events","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2540932/","name":"Yaz Canli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1854538/","name":"Kai Cofer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2562008/","name":"Christopher Karl Johnson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313962/","name":"Jude Gerard Prest"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

The Eye
programme.desc:
The Eye: Directed by David Moreau, Xavier Palud. With Jessica Alba, Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey, Rade Serbedzija. Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0406759/","name":"The Eye","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjczYmJhNjUtOTdmYi00MzZlLWEzOWYtNzA1ZGZjMjkwY2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0406759/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"applesauce91-2"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"It Could Have Been So Much More...","reviewBody":"I really wanted this movie to be good. Really. I think Jessica Alba is an extremely talented actress, and I had high hopes for this movie. J horror remake, interesting premise, Jessica Alba...sounds good so far. 

But this movie left me disappointed in when I saw it last night. The movie relies on cheap thrills that aren't frightening to the mature moviegoer. I should have expected this, as it was rated PG-13, but the theatre full of screaming 11 year olds at every jump was quite irritating. 

When it was all over, The Eye left me wanting more. The only thinking and mystery in the movie is done for you and the "science-talk" from Alba seems unrealistic. It relies on loud noises and horror movie clichés at every turn. The Eye is a definite popcorn movie. It may be entertaining for younger viewers, but if you want a deeper and more engaging story, look elsewhere.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52989,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-10-29","keywords":"corneal transplant,eye,violinist,eye transplant,seeing dead people","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Eye","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi263323929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1MzAyNzkxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzA4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1MzAyNzkxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzA4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Eye Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004695/","name":"Jessica Alba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000205/","name":"Parker Posey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1219963/","name":"David Moreau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0658837/","name":"Xavier Palud"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349406/","name":"Sebastian Gutierrez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1040327/","name":"Yuet-Jan Hui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161152/","name":"Oxide Chun Pang"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Edge of Winter
programme.desc: Edge of Winter: Directed by Rob Connolly. With Joel Kinnaman, Percy Hynes White, Tom Holland, Rachelle Lefevre. When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4526546/","name":"Edge of Winter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzOTg5NDE5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM5MTA1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4526546/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shemarnold"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cold and bleak but ok","reviewBody":"The setup of the story for the fathers downward spiral was reasonably done and one many part time fathers will identify with. Time was taken to show the relationship between the father and sons which means the climax feels a little rushed. Acting performances are good but some parts of the plot line are baffling. Like when the cabin is burned down so they can escape. Surely a stealthy escape would have given them more time? No movie is perfect and after seeing the reviews I wasn't expecting too much but despite the faults this was time well spent and a nice change from the blockbuster movie norm.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-08-02","keywords":"brother brother relationship,father son relationship,teenage boy,winter,snow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2060498713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODM0OTMwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ1OTA0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Recently divorced and laid off from his job, Elliot Baker (Joel Kinnaman, Suicide Squad; Run All Night) is desperate to spend more time bonding with his sons, Bradley (Tom Holland, Captain America: Civil War) and Caleb (Percy Hynes White, Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb). What starts as family day trip to teach his boys how to shoot turns into a nightmare when they become stranded. As they retreat to a desolate cabin, Elliot's mounting fear of losing custody pushes him to the edge. The brothers quickly realize that the man responsible for keeping them safe has now become their biggest threat."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1172478/","name":"Joel Kinnaman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4007171/","name":"Percy Hynes White"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4043618/","name":"Tom Holland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232635/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593227/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1954504/","name":"Kyle Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2618128/","name":"Rob Connolly"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Children of Men
Ludzkie dzieci
Children of Men
programme.desc: Children of Men: Directed by Alfonso Cuarón. With Juan Gabriel Yacuzzi, Mishal Husain, Rob Curling, Jon Chevalier. In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0206634/","name":"Children of Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NTI2NTI4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjk2NDA2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0206634/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jflet"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Carefully crafted piece of work","reviewBody":"This year I attended for the first time the Venice Film Festival in Italy. I was of course quite excited and bought tickets to some screenings of a few different films I found interesting. Initially Children of Men wasn't in my plans but I was convinced by a friend who was very enthusiastic about it. Now I say I'm glad I bought the tickets! What an amazing film this is. The science fiction genre is just a coat to project into the future the horrors and problems of our current days and many films attempt that ending up, in most cases, failing. This one however succeeds. Succeeds indeed but not only in this... The film blew away nearly everyone in the audience as one of the best action movies we have seen lately, with extremely exciting and brutal chases, gun fights, etc. Don't be put off by this though, the film is as good as it is not because of the action sequences but its amazingly emotional and touching story. The performances of the cast is impressive especially Clive Owen and the newcomer Claire Hope Ashitey who throughout the film develop the relationship between their characters and it's such a joy to see the development. I'm not very good at writing reviews so I think I'll stop know, but I had at least to transmit something to everyone who might be interested in watching this film. Don't pass this one, you won't regret it. In my view one of the few excellent films released this year.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":485003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2007-04-04","keywords":"long take,england,fertility,neo noir,british government","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'Extraction' Action Satisfaction Watchlist","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2615787033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3YmRlMjUtNzdkNS00Y2NhLWJlN2QtOTdiZGZjM2YzODUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3YmRlMjUtNzdkNS00Y2NhLWJlN2QtOTdiZGZjM2YzODUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this spoiler-filled IMDbrief, we break down the globe-trotting shoot-'em-up 'Extraction' and offer up some other action flicks if your pulse is pounding for more."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086710/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011026/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0786694/","name":"Timothy J. Initially Children of Men wasn't in my plans but I was convinced by a friend who was very enthusiastic about it. Now I say I'm glad I bought the tickets! What an amazing film this is. The science fiction genre is just a coat to project into the future the horrors and problems of our current days and many films attempt that ending up, in most cases, failing. This one however succeeds. Succeeds indeed but not only in this... The film blew away nearly everyone in the audience as one of the best action movies we have seen lately, with extremely exciting and brutal chases, gun fights, etc. Don't be put off by this though, the film is as good as it is not because of the action sequences but its amazingly emotional and touching story. The performances of the cast is impressive especially Clive Owen and the newcomer Claire Hope Ashitey who throughout the film develop the relationship between their characters and it's such a joy to see the development. I'm not very good at writing reviews so I think I'll stop know, but I had at least to transmit something to everyone who might be interested in watching this film. Don't pass this one, you won't regret it. In my view one of the few excellent films released this year.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":485003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2007-04-04","keywords":"long take,england,fertility,neo noir,british government","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'Extraction' Action Satisfaction Watchlist","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2615787033","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3YmRlMjUtNzdkNS00Y2NhLWJlN2QtOTdiZGZjM2YzODUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3YmRlMjUtNzdkNS00Y2NhLWJlN2QtOTdiZGZjM2YzODUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this spoiler-filled IMDbrief, we break down the globe-trotting shoot-'em-up 'Extraction' and offer up some other action flicks if your pulse is pounding for more.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086710/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011026/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0786694/","name":"Timothy J. programme.title: Night Hunter
Nocny łowca
Nomis
programme.desc:
Night Hunter: Directed by David Raymond. With Henry Cavill, Ben Kingsley, Alexandra Daddario, Stanley Tucci. A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6533240/","name":"Night Hunter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRhZTI3YzMtYjVmMi00ZDMyLWE1MGQtMWI0OTU5MzJmNmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6533240/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Such a shame for a missed golden opportunity","reviewBody":"This story (premise) had such opportunity to be a great film, but I guess the budget went more towards the top-billed cast, than in the production.

I certainly give credit to new filmmakers for taking the leap, and often don't critique them as hard due to their lack of experience. But newbie writer, director and producer David Raymond should've maybe had one lesser top-lead and invested in a seasoned screenwriter and editor - of where this film failed drastically in a missed golden opportunity.

The screenplay had major plot and technical issues, that could've been easily avoided, or edited properly. Then the editing in general was atrocious. A few scenes popped in and out within seconds and made no sense. The music/score was so overbearing it was annoying, and in some scenes louder than the dialogue. Raymond's lack of directing experience was evident in the poor shaky-cam shots, as it was in his failure to direct his sub-cast properly (the seasoned pros clearly handled their own). Brendan Fletcher was perfectly cast and great playing the character of Simon. But casting Henry Cavill was a huge mistake. His acting was stale and unconvincing, as well as annoying with his monotonic dialogue and poorly executed macho demeanor.

Nevertheless, for a newbie writer and director (this film being his 2nd/3rd resume entry as a filmmaker), it was surprisingly decent all things considered. Too bad it could've been great with proper editing and screenplay review. Still, a solid and well deserving 7/10 from me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19137,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime"],"datePublished":"2019-08-08","keywords":"revenge,kidnapping,escape,twins,twin","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Night Hunter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2931277593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU5NTc3OTUtNjE5ZS00MGNhLWI3MGUtMDM0ZDE4ZmNmMDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU5NTc3OTUtNjE5ZS00MGNhLWI3MGUtMDM0ZDE4ZmNmMDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1275259/","name":"Alexandra Daddario"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2006019/","name":"David Raymond"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0630228/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0298559/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009056/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2006019/","name":"David Raymond"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! Fortunately it's worth the wait!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":134442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001319/","name":"Mark Harmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564724/","name":"David McCallum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615266/","name":"Sean Murray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069074/","name":"Donald P. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.desc: NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service: Created by Donald P. Bellisario, Don McGill. With Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sean Murray, Pauley Perrette. The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0364845/","name":"NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVlMjZhYzYtOGQxNC00OTQxLTk2NzEtMWFmMmNhODA4YjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MDgwNjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! Fortunately it's worth the wait!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":134442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001319/","name":"Mark Harmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564724/","name":"David McCallum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615266/","name":"Sean Murray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069074/","name":"Donald P. Bellisario"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1453745/","name":"Don McGill"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: The Eigth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi291414809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJiZmZiNGUtNWFhMi00MzM0LWEzMjAtMTM2NzMyYzQzMjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJiZmZiNGUtNWFhMi00MzM0LWEzMjAtMTM2NzMyYzQzMjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for NCIS: The Eighth Season"}}</script><metacontent="

I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! Watch Spider-verse instead!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":61185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-07-28","keywords":"food,anthropomorphism,movie in title,no opening credits,title at the end","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2882779417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YyY2E4ZDctMDg1MC00NTA2LWE3MGUtZjAzMTJhOGRlMzA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YyY2E4ZDctMDg1MC00NTA2LWE3MGUtZjAzMTJhOGRlMzA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Emoji Movie unlocks the never-before-seen secret world inside your smartphone. Hidden within the messaging app is Textopolis, a bustling city where all your favorite emojis live, hoping to be selected by the phone's user. In this world, each emoji has only one facial expression - except for Gene, an exuberant emoji who was born without a filter and is bursting with multiple expressions. Determined to become "normal" like the other emojis, Gene enlists the help of his handy best friend Hi-5 and the notorious code breaker emoji Jailbreak. Together, they embark on an epic "app-venture" through the apps on the phone, each its own wild and fun world, to find the Code that will fix Gene. But when a greater danger threatens the phone, the fate of all emojis depends on these three unlikely friends who must save their world before it's deleted forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. Hidden within the messaging app is Textopolis, a bustling city where all your favorite emojis live, hoping to be selected by the phone's user. In this world, each emoji has only one facial expression - except for Gene, an exuberant emoji who was born without a filter and is bursting with multiple expressions. Determined to become "normal" like the other emojis, Gene enlists the help of his handy best friend Hi-5 and the notorious code breaker emoji Jailbreak. Together, they embark on an epic "app-venture" through the apps on the phone, each its own wild and fun world, to find the Code that will fix Gene. But when a greater danger threatens the phone, the fate of all emojis depends on these three unlikely friends who must save their world before it's deleted forever.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. programme.title: A Knight's Tale
Obłędny rycerz
A Knight's Tale
programme.desc:
A Knight's Tale: Directed by Brian Helgeland. With Heath Ledger, Rufus Sewell, Shannyn Sossamon, Paul Bettany. After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183790/","name":"A Knight's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5OTE4OTE2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDkzMTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HelenMary"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film was weighed measured and not found wanting at all","reviewBody":"This film shows without any quibbling just how bright the star of Heath Ledger was. He is luminous in this; beautiful, funny, physical and engaging. He plays excellently against the stunning Shannyn Sossamon, who fits perfectly into the modern medieval setting of this film. Set in the C14th a man of poor birth but sharp intellect rises through the ranks of page-dom with the desire to become a nobleman for food, fame, glory and love.

An impressive ensemble cast including the superior Paul Bettany (Chaucer - you can see he had fun with this rather exposing (!) role), Rufus Sewell, Mark Addy, Christopher Cazenove, James Purefoy and Alan Tudyk provides a film that is nigh-on flawless for cinematography that is exciting and gripping, the screenplay - the script - is amazing, laugh out loud funny all the way through. It's one of those films which require certain intelligence to get all the asides and witticisms, or numerous viewings to pick up on all of them, otherwise its still a funny and enjoyable film. With something for everyone this film is a joy to watch again and again, it's also attractive visually - many points to the costumers who mixed historical fashion with a modern edgy almost punk twist. Ditto the soundtrack - mixing in modern music was a clever touch, similar to Romeo and Juliet (Baz Luhrmann), and also an interesting look at fame and the cult of celebrity. 

A great viewing experience which sometimes even brings a tear to my eye. If you don't enjoy this film, there's something wrong with you. Ignore the haters, it's not supposed to be historically accurate or high-brow! Sometimes a feel-good, comfortable, Disney-esque story arc is just what you want.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180837,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"medieval times,knight,jousting,london england,chaucer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Knight's Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2427715865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
Jumanji: Przygoda w dżungli
Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc:
Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle: Directed by Jake Kasdan. With Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Jack Black, Karen Gillan. Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2283362/","name":"Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ0NDhjYWItYTMxZi00NTk2LWIzNDEtOWZiYWYxZjc2MTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2283362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jared_Andrews"},"dateCreated":"2018-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Movie is Pure Fun!","reviewBody":"The steady and impressive box office success is well-deserved. This movie is pure fun! Actually, it's more than fun; it's clever and perfectly 2018. 

 No one plays board games anymore, so what did the filmmakers do? They changed Jumanji into a video game. Simple, yet smart. This change not only made sense, it also opened the doors for the characters to possess and exhibit wildly over-the-top skills and physical abilities that would only make sense in a video game setting. 

 Also perfectly 2018, the handling of Karen Gillan's short shorts. The film earnestly attempts to comment on how video games exploit female characters in blatantly sexual ways. "Why am I wearing short shorts in the jungle?!" she exclaims. This scene is well done and could have made a worthy statement if the movie did not proceed to display her booty in the short shorts at multiple junctures throughout the film. The intentions were good; the execution, not so much.

 Gillan plays a powerful female badass exceptionally well. She even nails the necessary nuances required in playing a shy, unconfident student who is merely inhabiting the avatar of the female badass. Each star in the movie plays the embodiment of an avatar assumed by the high school kids after they are sucked into the Jumanji video game. I understand that the last sentence sounds ridiculous. That's Jumanji. You have to tolerate a bit of ridiculous. Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, and Jack Black all deliver in their roles. Hart is hilarious. Black reminds us that he is still funny. Jack Black should be in more funny movies. Johnson is equal parts funny and charming to such an obscene level that it almost doesn't make sense. He's at the point now that he can still be wonderful and charming, even if the movie around him falls woefully flat (shout out to Baywatch).

 Setting much of the film in a video game also excused an exceedingly simple plot. The movie embraces this. With all the funny lines, the best one comes when at one point someone asks a video game character in a car "why can't you just drive us where we need to go?" At that moment I realized that this movie knows exactly what it is.

 Still, the movie is not perfect. Bobby Canavale's villain character is strange in a strange way, rather than strange in a cool way. The dialogue has its flaws too. At one point, Jack Black's character gives a pep talk to Karen Gillan's character about confidence. At first, it seems like a lovely speech that tells a teenage girl that she has value because of who she is as a person. Then it abruptly ends with "I'm just saying you're a babe." Oh, so physical attractiveness is what gives her value? Ugh. Once again, they were so close to delivering a worthwhile message, but fell just short.

 These faults are only slight hiccups. Most viewers probably will barely notice them. They certainly didn't ruin my enjoyment of the movie. Above all else, the movie is about fun. And on that aspect, it comes through with flying colors.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":352586,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-12-20","keywords":"jungle,trapped in a game,title based on song,song in title,high school","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3413817625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUxNzE5MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwNzE2MzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUxNzE5MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwNzE2MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenagers discover an old video game console and are literally drawn into the game's jungle setting becoming the adult avatars they choose."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2394794/","name":"Karen Gillan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440458/","name":"Jake Kasdan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332017/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hitch
Hitch: Najlepszy doradca przeciętnego faceta
Hitch
programme.desc: Hitch: Directed by Andy Tennant. With Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta. A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0386588/","name":"Hitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzYyNzM2NzM2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg5NTQzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0386588/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"the-movie-guy"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cute date movie for Valentine's Day","reviewBody":"In this romantic comedy, Alex 'Hitch' Hitchins (Will Smith) is a legendary but anonymous date doctor in New York City. Hitch advises klutzy male wallflower clients on ways to make good first impressions on the women of their dreams. To contact Hitch, a man must have a referral from one of his former clients. Once Hitch accepts you as a client, he will coach you on your first three dates; after that, you're on your own. Hitch's newest client is Albert Brennaman (Kevin James), a fat tax accountant in love with a celebrity client, Allegra Cole (Amber Valetta). Allegra doesn't know that Albert exists, so Albert contacts Hitch to make his dream come true. Hitch decides to make Albert a client, even though, he knows this is going to be tough. While working on this job, Hitch meets Sara Melas (Eva Mendes), a gossip reporter for a daily tabloid, who is following Allegra's every move. Sara has given up on men, and Hitch wants to cut through that layer, because he is the master of love, so he thinks. With Valentine's Day around the corner, this is a good date movie. Women will love it, and men may pick up a few pointers. The movie is hilarious and filled with verbal and slapstick comedy from beginning to end. There are several scenes that may make you bust a gut laughing. IMDb data; ttnr: 0386588, Title: Hitch, --- Description: Hitch: Directed by Andy Tennant. With Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta. A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0386588/","name":"Hitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzYyNzM2NzM2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg5NTQzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0386588/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"the-movie-guy","dateCreated":"2005-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cute date movie for Valentine's Day","reviewBody":"In this romantic comedy, Alex 'Hitch' Hitchins (Will Smith) is a legendary but anonymous date doctor in New York City. Hitch advises klutzy male wallflower clients on ways to make good first impressions on the women of their dreams. To contact Hitch, a man must have a referral from one of his former clients. Once Hitch accepts you as a client, he will coach you on your first three dates; after that, you're on your own. Hitch's newest client is Albert Brennaman (Kevin James), a fat tax accountant in love with a celebrity client, Allegra Cole (Amber Valetta). Allegra doesn't know that Albert exists, so Albert contacts Hitch to make his dream come true. Hitch decides to make Albert a client, even though, he knows this is going to be tough. While working on this job, Hitch meets Sara Melas (Eva Mendes), a gossip reporter for a daily tabloid, who is following Allegra's every move. Sara has given up on men, and Hitch wants to cut through that layer, because he is the master of love, so he thinks. With Valentine's Day around the corner, this is a good date movie. Women will love it, and men may pick up a few pointers. The movie is hilarious and filled with verbal and slapstick comedy from beginning to end. There are several scenes that may make you bust a gut laughing. (Columbia, Run time 1:55, Rated PG-13)(8/10)","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":307581,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"gossip,quitting a job,newspaper,friendship,advice","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hitch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi811574297","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDlhZTM4MjQtMzEyNC00ODg4LWIxYzYtMmRmMjc3NGQ5MTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDlhZTM4MjQtMzEyNC00ODg4LWIxYzYtMmRmMjc3NGQ5MTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Hitch","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578949/","name":"Eva Mendes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0855035/","name":"Andy Tennant"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072775/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1358355/","name":"Kevin Bisch"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: This Is the End
To już jest koniec
This Is The End
programme.desc:
This Is the End: Directed by Evan Goldberg, Seth Rogen. With James Franco, Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel. Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1245492/","name":"This Is the End","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxODE3NjM1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzkzNjc4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1245492/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Ric-7"},"dateCreated":"2013-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A devil put aside for me","reviewBody":"I thoroughly enjoyed the film, though in retrospect, I am not sure if it is really a great film--there's not much to compare it to. One thing's for certain: this film is not "just like" any other film you could name. It is one of the funniest films I have seen in quite a while. And I am probably going to miss the Rapture as a result of my enjoyment.

The film has graphic sex talk and graphic violence. The dialog could hardly be any nastier. And of course, hardly more sacrilegious. However, despite all of that, the film is surprisingly good-natured.

This is not a film for children or for family viewing. Anyone who is squeamish or easily offended should stay away.

And don't automatically assume that anyone over 40 would not like this film. I'm over 60; I had a great time. So I saw it a second time, and loved it even more.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":399178,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-09-11","keywords":"apocalypse,ensemble cast,actress playing herself,actor playing himself,male friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Band Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi166438425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjI0ODE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExMjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjI0ODE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExMjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six friends become trapped in a house after a series of strange and catastrophic events devastate Los Angeles. As the world unravels outside, dwindling supplies and cabin fever threaten to tear apart the friendships inside. Eventually, they are forced to leave the house, facing their fate and the true meaning of friendship and redemption. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1706767/","name":"Jonah Hill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083540/","name":"Jason Stone"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Blue Streak: Directed by Les Mayfield. With Martin Lawrence, Luke Wilson, Peter Greene, Dave Chappelle. A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0181316/","name":"Blue Streak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJkYTBlZjktYmYyYi00ZWQ0LTgyMWYtMjQ5Yzg1Y2M3YzE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0181316/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BJ-54"},"dateCreated":"2000-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very funny","reviewBody":"This movie was about Martin Lawrence being double crossed during a jewel hyst. In the process of fighting off his co-conspirators, he is arrested and jailed for 2 years. He finds out that the warehouse, where the jewel is hidden, is now a police station. Lawrence gets a fake i.d. and becomes a police officer. Lawrence is a good police officer because 1) he is a crook at heart and 2) many of the crooks in town are his friends.\n\nAnyway, the movie gives you laugh after laugh of Martin outsmarting crooks trying to get on with the business of getting this jewel he previously stole. He eventually gets the jewel. A very funny movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80688,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1999-09-17","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,buddy comedy,cigarette,impostor,impersonator","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Streak","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1012900889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkYmQyNTYtMmY4YS00NjljLWFiZGYtNjM4ZTI2MzgzMzdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkYmQyNTYtMmY4YS00NjljLWFiZGYtNjM4ZTI2MzgzMzdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Blue Streak"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005561/","name":"Luke Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338886/","name":"Peter Greene"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562645/","name":"Les Mayfield"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0149490/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059088/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1158243/","name":"Michael Berry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089824/","name":"John Blumenthal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0364845/","name":"NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVlMjZhYzYtOGQxNC00OTQxLTk2NzEtMWFmMmNhODA4YjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MDgwNjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! Fortunately it's worth the wait!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":134442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001319/","name":"Mark Harmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564724/","name":"David McCallum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615266/","name":"Sean Murray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069074/","name":"Donald P. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk","dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0364845/","name":"NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVlMjZhYzYtOGQxNC00OTQxLTk2NzEtMWFmMmNhODA4YjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MDgwNjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! Fortunately it's worth the wait!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":134442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001319/","name":"Mark Harmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564724/","name":"David McCallum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615266/","name":"Sean Murray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069074/","name":"Donald P. programme.desc: The Emoji Movie: Directed by Tony Leondis. With T.J. Miller, James Corden, Anna Faris, Maya Rudolph. Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4877122/","name":"The Emoji Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzM3OTM2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM0NDU3MjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4877122/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"breezylightpony-51329"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terrible!!!","reviewBody":"Don't watch it, you'll waste your life!!! Watch Spider-verse instead!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":61185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-07-28","keywords":"food,anthropomorphism,movie in title,no opening credits,title at the end","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2882779417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YyY2E4ZDctMDg1MC00NTA2LWE3MGUtZjAzMTJhOGRlMzA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YyY2E4ZDctMDg1MC00NTA2LWE3MGUtZjAzMTJhOGRlMzA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Emoji Movie unlocks the never-before-seen secret world inside your smartphone. Hidden within the messaging app is Textopolis, a bustling city where all your favorite emojis live, hoping to be selected by the phone's user. In this world, each emoji has only one facial expression - except for Gene, an exuberant emoji who was born without a filter and is bursting with multiple expressions. Determined to become "normal" like the other emojis, Gene enlists the help of his handy best friend Hi-5 and the notorious code breaker emoji Jailbreak. Together, they embark on an epic "app-venture" through the apps on the phone, each its own wild and fun world, to find the Code that will fix Gene. But when a greater danger threatens the phone, the fate of all emojis depends on these three unlikely friends who must save their world before it's deleted forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0179479/","name":"James Corden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267506/","name":"Anna Faris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1902232/","name":"Tony Leondis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1902232/","name":"Tony Leondis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796928/","name":"Eric Siegel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
Obłędny rycerz
A Knight's Tale
programme.desc:
A Knight's Tale: Directed by Brian Helgeland. With Heath Ledger, Rufus Sewell, Shannyn Sossamon, Paul Bettany. After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183790/","name":"A Knight's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5OTE4OTE2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDkzMTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HelenMary"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film was weighed measured and not found wanting at all","reviewBody":"This film shows without any quibbling just how bright the star of Heath Ledger was. He is luminous in this; beautiful, funny, physical and engaging. He plays excellently against the stunning Shannyn Sossamon, who fits perfectly into the modern medieval setting of this film. Set in the C14th a man of poor birth but sharp intellect rises through the ranks of page-dom with the desire to become a nobleman for food, fame, glory and love.

An impressive ensemble cast including the superior Paul Bettany (Chaucer - you can see he had fun with this rather exposing (!) role), Rufus Sewell, Mark Addy, Christopher Cazenove, James Purefoy and Alan Tudyk provides a film that is nigh-on flawless for cinematography that is exciting and gripping, the screenplay - the script - is amazing, laugh out loud funny all the way through. It's one of those films which require certain intelligence to get all the asides and witticisms, or numerous viewings to pick up on all of them, otherwise its still a funny and enjoyable film. With something for everyone this film is a joy to watch again and again, it's also attractive visually - many points to the costumers who mixed historical fashion with a modern edgy almost punk twist. Ditto the soundtrack - mixing in modern music was a clever touch, similar to Romeo and Juliet (Baz Luhrmann), and also an interesting look at fame and the cult of celebrity. 

A great viewing experience which sometimes even brings a tear to my eye. If you don't enjoy this film, there's something wrong with you. Ignore the haters, it's not supposed to be historically accurate or high-brow! Sometimes a feel-good, comfortable, Disney-esque story arc is just what you want.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180837,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"medieval times,knight,jousting,london england,chaucer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Knight's Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2427715865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="
