programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: 7 raons per fugir
7 powodów do ucieczki
7 raons per fugir (de la societat)
programme.desc:
7 raons per fugir: Directed by Gerard Quinto, Esteve Soler, David Torras. With Francesc Orella, Rosa Cadafalch, Pol López, Vicky Peña. The family, the tenant, the wedding, the businessman, the neighbors, the poor child and the run over. 7 black comedy stories of a dysfunctional society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7416602/","name":"7 raons per fugir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM2OTI2N2ItZGM3Yi00ZTJmLWI5M2UtMDUxYjU0NWIwNDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The family, the tenant, the wedding, the businessman, the neighbors, the poor child and the run over. 7 black comedy stories of a dysfunctional society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7416602/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"arriva"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Aspires to be something bigger, fails spectacularly","reviewBody":"This film contains seven stories which the director tries to tie up at the end but the result is just ridiculous and nonsensical.

Also, speaking of the stories, the first and the last ones are an interesting and fresh take on sociopaths, however the other five in the middle are an incoherent supernatural and dubious mess which touches on some social issues in a way you're just left shaking your head in disbelief and confusion.

programme.title: Masz na imie Justine
Masz na imię Justine
programme.desc:
Masz na imie Justine: Directed by Franco de Pena. With Anna Cieslak, Arno Frisch, Rafal Mackowiak, Mathieu Carrière. When Polish teenager Mariola is duped by her new boyfriend and sold to a sex-trafficking ring in Germany, she is faced with a choice: die along with her grandmother, or adopt to her new identity as an experienced call-girl." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479257/","name":"Masz na imie Justine","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ5MTQ0ODQ3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzkyODI5NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Polish teenager Mariola is duped by her new boyfriend and sold to a sex-trafficking ring in Germany, she is faced with a choice: die along with her grandmother, or adopt to her new identity as an experienced call-girl.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479257/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ocosis"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dark.","reviewBody":"Similar in tone to Lukas Moodysson's Lilja 4-Ever, Masz Na Imie Justine is another study of human trafficking, and the effects this horror has on the soul. Anna Cieslak gives a strong performance as the fated Mariola, a young Polish girl, who's leaves her home looking for a brighter future, but ends up being delivered into the hands of devils.

Cieslak's performance is the strongest part of the movie. As a film it's competently realised, but also feels a little vacuous, although that same feeling works well alongside Cieslak's character, whom understandably is losing her self to the tortures she is forced into.

As with Lilja 4-Ever, Masz Na Imie Justine is an important film, that warns us of the evil that man can inflict, and it is a horror that is sadly all too real.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":482,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pig,slaughterhouse,toasting with a drink,drinking vodka,male female relationship","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1752088/","name":"Anna Cieslak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295823/","name":"Arno Frisch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0533650/","name":"Rafal Mackowiak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0210938/","name":"Franco de Pena"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143581/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121022/","name":"Chris Burdza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1268993/","name":"Tomasz Kepski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0210938/","name":"Franco de Pena"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa
Kochankowie roku tygrysa
programme.desc:
Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. programme.title: Nie ten czlowiek
Nie ten człowiek
programme.desc: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. Though none too convinced, he starts work as a delivery man. Having set out on his first delivery soon after he witnesses a traffic accident. He ends up giving a statement at the police station. And his plans begin to unravel. By a twist of fate Kuba has no idea about the significance of the part he will have to play on this particular day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1808335/","name":"Nie ten czlowiek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkzODc4ZGUtNGYzZi00YzdmLWJkMWMtZDE5YzYxNThiNDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. IMDb data; ttnr: 1808335, Title: Nie ten czlowiek, --- Description: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: MTV Unplugged. Krzysztof Zalewski
programme.desc: W repertuarze znajdują się utwory z krążka "Zabawa", ale też te z poprzednich płyt - wszystkie w akustycznych aranżacjach.

programme.title: Fever Pitch
Miłosna zagrywka
Fever Pitch
programme.desc:
Fever Pitch: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler. Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Barky44"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Decent Enough Distraction","reviewBody":"Fever Pitch is a fun enough movie. It has a lot of funny moments (including a hilariously disturbing shower scene). Like most romantic comedies, it has a "dead zone" in the middle where all the heavy, "she's breaking up with me" stuff happens, but other than that it continues to be funny until the end.

Even though the plot revolves around fanaticism towards the Red Sox, it's not overloaded with sports. You don't have to be a fan to enjoy this film.

Of course that's easy for me to say: I've been a Red Sox fan since I was a boy, too.

7 out of 10.

programme.title: Niezapomniane filmy o tańcu
programme.desc: Historia kina pełna jest aktorów, którzy wytańczyli sobie miejsce w panteonie, i produkcji, których choreografia budzi nieprzemijający podziw. Twórcy dokumentu zapraszają widzów na przegląd 25 najbardziej ekscytujących układów tanecznych w filmach.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
Kiedyś było bosko
I Used to Go Here
programme.desc:
I Used to Go Here: Directed by Kris Rey. With Gillian Jacobs, Jemaine Clement, Josh Wiggins, Forrest Goodluck. Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10887902/","name":"I Used to Go Here","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThkYWYwMzQtZTUxMi00YTJmLWFiOTItNTAxMWY5ZjE4MmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college stud","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10887902/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"js-66130"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"BACK TO SCHOOL","reviewBody":"Can a mid-life crisis sneak up on a 35 year old? Let's not be ageist about this matter, of course it can.

Gillian Jacobs translates her wonderfully sassy yet confused young woman character of "Love" (Netflix, worth the binge) into aspiring author Kate Jacobs, rebounding from a cancelled book tour to revisit her alma mater at the request of her old prof crush.

Mayhem ensues. Well, not really, but something better. Whilst her friends are back home with very pregnant bellies, single Kate anxiously jumps back into college, if only for a brief escapade. Enraptured by the youth and vitality of her previous life, Kate slips back into a comfy place, leaving her spiralling mess adult self behind.

Avoiding sliding into "Animal House" debauchery, "I Used To Go Here" tackles a series of comedic and romantic escapades in a fresh, believable manner. Kate's complicated relationship with her old mentor (a wonderfully nuanced turn by Jermaine Clement) is at the core of the film, isn't dwelled on but played out naturally, and revisited cleverly when the movie comes full circle.

All this rests on the lead's shoulders, and she manages to shoulder it quite well. Jacobs is that rare breed: a wide-eyed actor who is both endearing and relatable enough to carry the movie, which as it turns out, is pretty good.


* hipCRANK

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Nocna randka
Date Night
programme.desc:
Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson, Hank Azaria. Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1078912/","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZjZDE2NjUtMzVkNy00N2UyLTg5MjYtYzY1ZmM1YWY3ZTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1078912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ajaymittal"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stiller Going Strong","reviewBody":"In a world where unnecessary sequels are plaguing the movie world and are seemingly released for little other reason than to milk the 'cash cow', Night at the Museum 2 is a refreshing exception (unlike Meet the Parents 2,3,4...). It's arguably better than the first.

Although better on different levels The historic characters are not just new and improved but also come with a greater comic value. In what the film lacks in a relatively mundane storyline, it compensates with a wonderful underlying message/moral. There's also a love story again but what struck me as more potent was the greater bond that exists between the rest of the characters; Larry and Jedediah, Jedediah and Octavius etc. The score/music was noticeably better as well, very listenable. Of course the whole picture was far more 'epic' and I, for one, am a fan of this. On the face of this, its a comedy blended perfectly with action like a cocktail of strawberry and champagne – and very much like Tropic Thunder (although on a different level of course). Hank Azaria was brilliant as Kahmunrah especially in the way he could turn from serious evil to light-hearted joker in the blink of an eye. Speaking of which, him and his trio of evil helpers were fantastic together, as am sure you'll all agree.

The one downside is that too many of the best comedy moments were shown in the trailers, so kind of dampening the effect of many of the genuinely funny moments. But there's still enough to keep you chuckling away! So should there be a third? If they can continue to make people laugh whilst rummaging through their popcorn during the action scenes, I'd day why not? After all, what is life without a bit of fun?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":187813,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-05-20","keywords":"al capone character,darth vader character,theodore roosevelt character,abraham lincoln character,albert einstein character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1663697689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institute in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304830/","name":"Robert Ben Garant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502073/","name":"Thomas Lennon"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le divorce
Rozwód po francusku
Le Divorce
programme.desc:
Le divorce: Directed by James Ivory. With Kate Hudson, Jean-Marie Lhomme, Naomi Watts, Esmée Buchet-Deàk. French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0306734/","name":"Le divorce","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMjQ0MDgzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjM1MDY2._V1_.jpg","description":"French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0306734/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lawprof"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"It Could Have Been Good","reviewBody":""Le Divorce" fails. Despite the beauty of the locales and the talent of the lead actors, the director couldn't decide if this is a Parisian comedy or an adult tale of marital discord gone horrifically askew.

The interaction between the two female leads is good-half-sisters and true soulmates. But their romantic and marital complications come too fast with too little depth and the film is on a train wreck in the making.

And suave, affluent, cheating Frenchmen are a stale staple of these movies. Nothing new or interesting here.

Too bad.

4/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11372,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-08-29","keywords":"cartoon on tv,american,french,love,sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Le Divorce","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1636958489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODIxZDhmOTUtZDE5OS00M2RlLWJkM2ItYjQxMjE2YWE0MjE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODIxZDhmOTUtZDE5OS00M2RlLWJkM2ItYjQxMjE2YWE0MjE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005028/","name":"Kate Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915208/","name":"Naomi Watts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000330/","name":"Stockard Channing"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412465/","name":"James Ivory"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055367/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424956/","name":"Diane Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695609/","name":"Ruth Prawer Jhabvala"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412465/","name":"James Ivory"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nie ten czlowiek
Nie ten człowiek
programme.desc: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. Though none too convinced, he starts work as a delivery man. Having set out on his first delivery soon after he witnesses a traffic accident. He ends up giving a statement at the police station. And his plans begin to unravel. By a twist of fate Kuba has no idea about the significance of the part he will have to play on this particular day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1808335/","name":"Nie ten czlowiek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkzODc4ZGUtNGYzZi00YzdmLWJkMWMtZDE5YzYxNThiNDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. programme.title: Kiler-ów 2-óch
Kiler-ów 2-óch
programme.desc: Kiler-ów 2-óch: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Janusz Rewinski, Jerzy Stuhr. Jurek Kiler (see the prequel to this movie, "Kiler") has become a VIP - sponsoring the Polish government, playing tennis with the President, and stuff. He must oversee a transfer of a substantial amount of gold. However, in his past activities, he has made enemies. Mighty ones. And thus Jurek Kiler's next adventure begins as he has to face attempts at kidnapping, assassinations, and problems in his love life..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190506/","name":"Kiler-ów 2-óch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjNiZjNmNDItYzcwNS00NDc0LTlhYjEtNGNmZGFhYmJkMzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurek Kiler (see the prequel to this movie, "Kiler") has become a VIP - sponsoring the Polish government, playing tennis with the President, and stuff. He must oversee a transfer of a substantial amount of gold. However, in his past ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mastyk"},"dateCreated":"2001-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't waste your time!","reviewBody":"Very good director - Juliusz Machulski made an awful movie. programme.title: Fever Pitch
Miłosna zagrywka
Fever Pitch
programme.desc:
Fever Pitch: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler. Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Barky44"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Decent Enough Distraction","reviewBody":"Fever Pitch is a fun enough movie. It has a lot of funny moments (including a hilariously disturbing shower scene). Like most romantic comedies, it has a "dead zone" in the middle where all the heavy, "she's breaking up with me" stuff happens, but other than that it continues to be funny until the end.

Even though the plot revolves around fanaticism towards the Red Sox, it's not overloaded with sports. You don't have to be a fan to enjoy this film.

Of course that's easy for me to say: I've been a Red Sox fan since I was a boy, too.

7 out of 10.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
Kiedyś było bosko
I Used to Go Here
programme.desc:
I Used to Go Here: Directed by Kris Rey. With Gillian Jacobs, Jemaine Clement, Josh Wiggins, Forrest Goodluck. Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10887902/","name":"I Used to Go Here","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThkYWYwMzQtZTUxMi00YTJmLWFiOTItNTAxMWY5ZjE4MmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college stud","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10887902/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"js-66130"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"BACK TO SCHOOL","reviewBody":"Can a mid-life crisis sneak up on a 35 year old? Let's not be ageist about this matter, of course it can.

Gillian Jacobs translates her wonderfully sassy yet confused young woman character of "Love" (Netflix, worth the binge) into aspiring author Kate Jacobs, rebounding from a cancelled book tour to revisit her alma mater at the request of her old prof crush.

Mayhem ensues. Well, not really, but something better. Whilst her friends are back home with very pregnant bellies, single Kate anxiously jumps back into college, if only for a brief escapade. Enraptured by the youth and vitality of her previous life, Kate slips back into a comfy place, leaving her spiralling mess adult self behind.

Avoiding sliding into "Animal House" debauchery, "I Used To Go Here" tackles a series of comedic and romantic escapades in a fresh, believable manner. Kate's complicated relationship with her old mentor (a wonderfully nuanced turn by Jermaine Clement) is at the core of the film, isn't dwelled on but played out naturally, and revisited cleverly when the movie comes full circle.

All this rests on the lead's shoulders, and she manages to shoulder it quite well. Jacobs is that rare breed: a wide-eyed actor who is both endearing and relatable enough to carry the movie, which as it turns out, is pretty good.


* hipCRANK

Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10887902/","name":"I Used to Go Here","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThkYWYwMzQtZTUxMi00YTJmLWFiOTItNTAxMWY5ZjE4MmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college stud","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10887902/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"js-66130","dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"BACK TO SCHOOL","reviewBody":"Can a mid-life crisis sneak up on a 35 year old? Let's not be ageist about this matter, of course it can.

Gillian Jacobs translates her wonderfully sassy yet confused young woman character of "Love" (Netflix, worth the binge) into aspiring author Kate Jacobs, rebounding from a cancelled book tour to revisit her alma mater at the request of her old prof crush.

Mayhem ensues. Well, not really, but something better. Whilst her friends are back home with very pregnant bellies, single Kate anxiously jumps back into college, if only for a brief escapade. Enraptured by the youth and vitality of her previous life, Kate slips back into a comfy place, leaving her spiralling mess adult self behind.

Avoiding sliding into "Animal House" debauchery, "I Used To Go Here" tackles a series of comedic and romantic escapades in a fresh, believable manner. Kate's complicated relationship with her old mentor (a wonderfully nuanced turn by Jermaine Clement) is at the core of the film, isn't dwelled on but played out naturally, and revisited cleverly when the movie comes full circle.

All this rests on the lead's shoulders, and she manages to shoulder it quite well. Jacobs is that rare breed: a wide-eyed actor who is both endearing and relatable enough to carry the movie, which as it turns out, is pretty good.


* hipCRANK

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Nocna randka
Date Night
programme.desc:
Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson, Hank Azaria. Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1078912/","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZjZDE2NjUtMzVkNy00N2UyLTg5MjYtYzY1ZmM1YWY3ZTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1078912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ajaymittal"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stiller Going Strong","reviewBody":"In a world where unnecessary sequels are plaguing the movie world and are seemingly released for little other reason than to milk the 'cash cow', Night at the Museum 2 is a refreshing exception (unlike Meet the Parents 2,3,4...). It's arguably better than the first.

Although better on different levels The historic characters are not just new and improved but also come with a greater comic value. In what the film lacks in a relatively mundane storyline, it compensates with a wonderful underlying message/moral. There's also a love story again but what struck me as more potent was the greater bond that exists between the rest of the characters; Larry and Jedediah, Jedediah and Octavius etc. The score/music was noticeably better as well, very listenable. Of course the whole picture was far more 'epic' and I, for one, am a fan of this. On the face of this, its a comedy blended perfectly with action like a cocktail of strawberry and champagne – and very much like Tropic Thunder (although on a different level of course). Hank Azaria was brilliant as Kahmunrah especially in the way he could turn from serious evil to light-hearted joker in the blink of an eye. Speaking of which, him and his trio of evil helpers were fantastic together, as am sure you'll all agree.

The one downside is that too many of the best comedy moments were shown in the trailers, so kind of dampening the effect of many of the genuinely funny moments. But there's still enough to keep you chuckling away! So should there be a third? If they can continue to make people laugh whilst rummaging through their popcorn during the action scenes, I'd day why not? After all, what is life without a bit of fun?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":187813,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-05-20","keywords":"al capone character,darth vader character,theodore roosevelt character,abraham lincoln character,albert einstein character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1663697689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institute in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304830/","name":"Robert Ben Garant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502073/","name":"Thomas Lennon"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Trick: Directed by Patrick Lussier. With Jamie Kennedy, Omar Epps, Tom Atkins, Melody Hurd. A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9177040/","name":"Trick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2NhZDkwMzktNjIzNy00NTBjLWJhYzQtNDQyN2I0NzQ4NDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTEyMDE1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9177040/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deloudelouvain"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you like slashers it's okay.","reviewBody":"For this genre, slasher/horror, I guess it's an okay movie. There will never be gems in this genre and this one isn't one either, but it's watchable if you like a bit of gore and a dumb mindless story. Because that's what it basically is, a vilain that looks like he can't be killed or injured, a bunch of cops that outdumb each other constantly, a whole bunch of bad decisions, mixed with a lot of slashing and blood, and you get Trick. Too bad there are so much dumb scenes otherwise it could have been better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4806,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-10-18","keywords":"halloween,splatter,slasher,gore,bloody","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1954987801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ0NGJlMTctNGFmYy00OWI2LTk4YTYtZjBjYmY4ZWMzNmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ0NGJlMTctNGFmYy00OWI2LTk4YTYtZjBjYmY4ZWMzNmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On Halloween night in 2015, Patrick "Trick" Weaver massacred his classmates at a costume party. After being arrested, he managed to escape police custody, but not before being shot five times by Detective Mike Denver (Epps). Everyone believes Trick must be dead, but when a masked killer reappears the following Halloween, and every Halloween after that, they realize the nightmare is not over. With Trick wreaking havoc and killing innocent people in increasingly terrifying ways, Denver will stop at nothing to finish what he started and bring the carnage to an end."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005085/","name":"Jamie Kennedy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004898/","name":"Omar Epps"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040662/","name":"Tom Atkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746728/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0766776/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267805/","name":"Todd Farmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: W spirali: Directed by Konrad Aksinowicz. With Piotr Stramowski, Katarzyna Warnke, Olga Boladz, Antoni Królikowski. An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. Tamir is a witness to, and a catalyst of their problems, a self-appointed healer wishing to become their path to enlightenment. Krzysztof and Agnes know they shouldn't be together but they are unable to part, or perhaps they do not want to? IMDb data; ttnr: 4092514, Title: W spirali, --- Description: W spirali: Directed by Konrad Aksinowicz. With Piotr Stramowski, Katarzyna Warnke, Olga Boladz, Antoni Królikowski. An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. Tamir is a witness to, and a catalyst of their problems, a self-appointed healer wishing to become their path to enlightenment. Krzysztof and Agnes know they shouldn't be together but they are unable to part, or perhaps they do not want to? "Into the Spiral" is a story of love which is restless, dangerous and toxic." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4092514/","name":"W spirali","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY3M2NjNWMtNzY3MC00NGY3LWJiNTMtMWEyZTBmZjc4OGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY0OTk2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Les Misérables
Les Misérables: Nędznicy
Les Misérables
programme.desc:
Les Misérables: Directed by Tom Hooper. With Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried. In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1707386/","name":"Les Misérables","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NDI3NDg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY5OTI1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1707386/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"antesdespues"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Breathtaking - A Musical with Heart","reviewBody":"I went to an awards screening of Les Miserables and left the cinema speechless. Tom Hooper's direction and the cinematography, costumes, art design and editing are nothing short of genius.

Hooper's idea to have the actors sing live really brings a deeper emotion to the film not seen in other movie musicals. Hugh Jackman is absolutely incredible as Jean Valjean and carries the film with spectacular grace. Anne Hathaway is magnificent in her fleeting role as Fantine - the film's sequence in which she goes on a downward spiral is one of the it's best moments, and her ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE HEARTFELT rendition of 'I Dreamed A Dream' will win her the Oscar by itself.

Also, a great supporting turn from newcomer Samantha Barks as the heartbroken Eponine (look out for her waist - it's absolutely tiny!), who is sure to be shot into stardom. Eddie Redmayne, Russell Crowe and Aaron Tveit are also good, and there's some great comedy relief from Helena Bonham Carter and Sacha Baron Cohen.

It will leave you laughing, crying, and feeling inspired. A great watch, sure to win some major awards this year! 10/10!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Musical","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-01-02","keywords":"rebellion,france,orphan,parole,barricade","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Supporting Actress","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2712512281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODYxODY1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk3OTc3OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODYxODY1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk3OTc3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a TV trailer for Les Miserables."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393799/","name":"Tom Hooper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103961/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098842/","name":"Alain Boublil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774744/","name":"Claude-Michel Schönberg"}],"duration":"PT2H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: American Utopia
David Byrne: American Utopia
David Byrne's American Utopia
programme.desc: American Utopia: Directed by Spike Lee. With David Byrne, Jacqueline Acevedo, Gustavo Di Dalva, Daniel Freedman. Spike Lee documents the former Talking Heads frontman's brilliant, timely 2019 Broadway show, based on his recent album and tour of the same name." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11874226/","name":"American Utopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGEzOWU5YmUtNjI0Mi00YzQ4LWIwODgtYWU0NDMyYTZkYjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spike Lee documents the former Talking Heads frontman's brilliant, timely 2019 Broadway show, based on his recent album and tour of the same name.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11874226/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"garethcrook"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Almost as good as being in the room.","reviewBody":"This was one of my favourite gigs a couple of years back, certainly the most innovative show I've witness in, well ever! David Byrne's American Utopia is as much theatre as it is concert and as a result probably works better as a recorded concert film than most. I'm not going to tell you in matches the live performance. You can't replicate being in the room, feeling that spark of the occasion and sharing it with thousands. We can't share anything live right now though of course, so having this recording is something of a blessing. Here you get the luxury of multiple cameras, close ups, alternative perspectives and there is a lot to see. Live the show looks bravely simplistic. Byrne and his band, barefoot and decked out in matching grey suits, housed in box made of chain curtains, one side open to the audience. Every song is injected with creative lighting and dancing. It's every bit the performance. Unless you're a big Talking Heads fan, a traditional show might be dull, expected. Not hear though, it's wonderful whether you're a fan or not. This I think is largely due to it all looking so much damn fun, it's a celebration of music. The wires, amps, drum risers are all striped away. Each player is wireless, allowed to move freely and dance around one another. Not too surprising with the singers and the guitars, but to do this with keyboards and drums too, especially drums theres some seriously clever stuff going on there, well it looks like magic. It really is quite incredible, a good live band is a good live band, they're tight and controlled, fluid. To do it with this many players, whilst following choreographed routines is stunning. Byrne is charming and humble as he delivers short monologues between songs and he's in fine voice too. I am a fan, not a huge fan, but you get plenty of big hits alongside the American Utopia tracks to keep everyone happy and even through the screen, the joy of this music comes through. Perhaps most of all when the chains part in the curtains and more band members appear. With so much space, it's not unusual for a dozen people to perform together, creating not only a wonderful visual, but a fantastic sound too. Byrne is the conductor at the centre, orchestrating his vision. One of positivity and inclusivity. It's marvellous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Documentary","Music","Musical"],"datePublished":"2020-10-17","keywords":"two word title,broadway show,based on album,band,nationality in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1783217689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMzZjE1ZWItNDZlNC00YWVjLWIzZDctMjI3ODJhZTI1OTc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMzZjE1ZWItNDZlNC00YWVjLWIzZDctMjI3ODJhZTI1OTc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"David Byrne’s American Utopia brings the critically acclaimed Broadway show to HBO in a one-of-a-kind film directed by Oscar and Emmy-winner Spike Lee. Recorded during its run at Broadway’s Hudson Theatre in New York City, David Byrne is joined by an ensemble of 11 musicians, singers, and dancers from around the globe, inviting audiences into a joyous dreamworld where human connection, self-evolution, and social justice are paramount."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126154/","name":"David Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11897170/","name":"Jacqueline Acevedo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11897171/","name":"Gustavo Di Dalva"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000490/","name":"Spike Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126154/","name":"David Byrne"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

David Byrne's American Utopia is as much theatre as it is concert and as a result probably works better as a recorded concert film than most. I'm not going to tell you in matches the live performance. You can't replicate being in the room, feeling that spark of the occasion and sharing it with thousands. We can't share anything live right now though of course, so having this recording is something of a blessing. Here you get the luxury of multiple cameras, close ups, alternative perspectives and there is a lot to see. Live the show looks bravely simplistic. Byrne and his band, barefoot and decked out in matching grey suits, housed in box made of chain curtains, one side open to the audience. Every song is injected with creative lighting and dancing. It's every bit the performance. Unless you're a big Talking Heads fan, a traditional show might be dull, expected. Not hear though, it's wonderful whether you're a fan or not. This I think is largely due to it all looking so much damn fun, it's a celebration of music. The wires, amps, drum risers are all striped away. Each player is wireless, allowed to move freely and dance around one another. Not too surprising with the singers and the guitars, but to do this with keyboards and drums too, especially drums theres some seriously clever stuff going on there, well it looks like magic. It really is quite incredible, a good live band is a good live band, they're tight and controlled, fluid. To do it with this many players, whilst following choreographed routines is stunning. Byrne is charming and humble as he delivers short monologues between songs and he's in fine voice too. I am a fan, not a huge fan, but you get plenty of big hits alongside the American Utopia tracks to keep everyone happy and even through the screen, the joy of this music comes through. Perhaps most of all when the chains part in the curtains and more band members appear. With so much space, it's not unusual for a dozen people to perform together, creating not only a wonderful visual, but a fantastic sound too. Byrne is the conductor at the centre, orchestrating his vision. One of positivity and inclusivity. It's marvellous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Documentary","Music","Musical"],"datePublished":"2020-10-17","keywords":"two word title,broadway show,based on album,band,nationality in title","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1783217689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMzZjE1ZWItNDZlNC00YWVjLWIzZDctMjI3ODJhZTI1OTc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMzZjE1ZWItNDZlNC00YWVjLWIzZDctMjI3ODJhZTI1OTc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"David Byrne’s American Utopia brings the critically acclaimed Broadway show to HBO in a one-of-a-kind film directed by Oscar and Emmy-winner Spike Lee. Recorded during its run at Broadway’s Hudson Theatre in New York City, David Byrne is joined by an ensemble of 11 musicians, singers, and dancers from around the globe, inviting audiences into a joyous dreamworld where human connection, self-evolution, and social justice are paramount.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126154/","name":"David Byrne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11897170/","name":"Jacqueline Acevedo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11897171/","name":"Gustavo Di Dalva"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000490/","name":"Spike Lee"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029134/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139821/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126154/","name":"David Byrne"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Teen Spirit: Directed by Max Minghella. With Elle Fanning, Agnieszka Grochowska, Archie Madekwe, Zlatko Buric. Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by a pop-fueled soundtrack, Teen Spirit is a visceral and stylish spin on the Cinderella story." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6483364/","name":"Teen Spirit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk0MmFmMDAtNDY0YS00MTk2LTkwMGItYWQ5M2U4MzM0ZWM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. Driven by","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483364/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieIQTest"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"This was like high school drama project","reviewBody":"Terrible screenplay, bad directing, horrible supporting actors, especially the old guy pretended to be a famous opera singer, and his presence making this hollow movie even more shallow. The storyline is like a animal blazed trail in the wilderness, if you don't pay attention, you don't even know where it is. There's nothing in this movie except some so so songs. Because of the awkward script, Elle Fanning was forced to play a boring and hollow character. There's no way a person like she played could sing from the heart. I rarely found a movie with such huge nothingness to tell. Horse, goat, sunset, stage lights, some young bimbos in high school, plus a loner, an outsider, a poor farm Polish girl on the Isle of nothing. This is one of the most awkward movies in recent years, with nothing to tell, just throw in several teen songs to make up a movie. Jesus...."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8555,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-04-19","keywords":"singer,singing,bar singer,bar,horse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3412245017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTUzYTJmNTItZGQ1Yi00Y2E0LWJkMDAtNDkwMjU2NDQ1MGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTUzYTJmNTItZGQ1Yi00Y2E0LWJkMDAtNDkwMjU2NDQ1MGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violet (Elle Fanning) dreams of pop stardom to escape her small town and shattered family life. programme.title: Military Wives
Pojedynek na głosy
Military Wives
programme.desc: Military Wives: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Kristin Scott Thomas, Sharon Horgan, Emma Lowndes, Gaby French. With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8951692/","name":"Military Wives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWUxZGJkNjgtMDFjMC00ZTFiLTlmMGMtZGZmNWY4N2FlOWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MzE4MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8951692/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rustonreviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uplifting and emotional.","reviewBody":"Inspired by the real life Military Wives Choirs network (consisting of 75 choirs throughout the UK and overseas), Military Wives follows a group of women who're left behind on the home front while their partners serve in Afghanistan. Using the catharsis of music to help them cope with the absence of their partners, they found the very first military wives choir. Managed by Kate (Thomas) and Lisa (Horgan), two women who possess extremely conflicting personalities and objectives, the choir steadily acquires widespread media attention that will result in the formation of an influential movement. Cattaneo's film focuses on the kinship shared between these women, each of whom have their own burdens to bear in the face of such uncertain adversity. Much of the films strength comes from the sincerity of the performances, particularly leads Kristin Scott Thomas and Sharon Horgan, who clash repeatedly throughout the film. Tunnard and Flynn's screenplay strikes a perfect balance in tone, too. It accomplishes a combination of both humour and tragedy (which is perhaps one of the most difficult dichotomies to nail in screenwriting) in a way that never feels superficial, and although it is clear to see the echoes of where it is all going to go, it's difficult not to become invested in the journey. Military Wives is a heartfelt film that is both uplifting and emotional, with standout performances and a truly brilliant final song that brings the whole piece together wonderfully.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4560,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-03-06","keywords":"friendship,singing,bus,drinking,bar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4201561881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRkODczMzQtNDJjZS00ZjU0LTk3NTctZDMwNmM2MzViMTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRkODczMzQtNDJjZS00ZjU0LTk3NTctZDMwNmM2MzViMTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000218/","name":"Kristin Scott Thomas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1279721/","name":"Sharon Horgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1266378/","name":"Emma Lowndes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0407896/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2074041/","name":"Rachel Tunnard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1598473/","name":"Rosanne Flynn"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

Using the catharsis of music to help them cope with the absence of their partners, they found the very first military wives choir. Managed by Kate (Thomas) and Lisa (Horgan), two women who possess extremely conflicting personalities and objectives, the choir steadily acquires widespread media attention that will result in the formation of an influential movement. Cattaneo's film focuses on the kinship shared between these women, each of whom have their own burdens to bear in the face of such uncertain adversity. Much of the films strength comes from the sincerity of the performances, particularly leads Kristin Scott Thomas and Sharon Horgan, who clash repeatedly throughout the film. Tunnard and Flynn's screenplay strikes a perfect balance in tone, too. It accomplishes a combination of both humour and tragedy (which is perhaps one of the most difficult dichotomies to nail in screenwriting) in a way that never feels superficial, and although it is clear to see the echoes of where it is all going to go, it's difficult not to become invested in the journey. Military Wives is a heartfelt film that is both uplifting and emotional, with standout performances and a truly brilliant final song that brings the whole piece together wonderfully.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4560,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-03-06","keywords":"friendship,singing,bus,drinking,bar","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4201561881","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRkODczMzQtNDJjZS00ZjU0LTk3NTctZDMwNmM2MzViMTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRkODczMzQtNDJjZS00ZjU0LTk3NTctZDMwNmM2MzViMTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000218/","name":"Kristin Scott Thomas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1279721/","name":"Sharon Horgan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1266378/","name":"Emma Lowndes"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0407896/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784476/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2074041/","name":"Rachel Tunnard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1598473/","name":"Rosanne Flynn"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7549996/","name":"Judy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmE0OTE5NWItMGYyZi00MzUxLWFjN2QtYzBkZGRjZGVmMGFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7549996/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pedroborges-90881"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Judy movie review","reviewBody":"The history of actors, especially the young ones, being extremely controlled and abused by the industry is a very strong material for a movie, but not really explored here as it could be, because even with the flashbacks scenes the movie is more focused on a certain period of Judy Garland life, is not really a biopic, like the title suggests. programme.title: Danny Collins
Idol
Danny Collins
programme.desc: Danny Collins: Directed by Dan Fogelman. With Al Pacino, Annette Bening, Jennifer Garner, Bobby Cannavale. An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772288/","name":"Danny Collins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk5NTYxOTk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIxMjE0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772288/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billcurry-1"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intellectually and Emotionally Stimulating Film","reviewBody":"Because this film is intellectually and emotionally stimulating in a subtle way, I had to drive 65 miles, from Lafayette to Baton Rouge, where it was in was in one compartment of a multiplex. That the compartment was Number Nine was a nice touch. But New Orleans had it in three theaters. My review: I enjoyed it. Been a fan of Pacino since Dog Day Afternoon, Plummer since Sound of Music, Lennon since fall, 1963. And I've never seen a movie with Annette Bening that I didn't' like. The script was good; I didn't see anything not to like. So why didn't the movie come to me rather than vice versa? Apparently, the theater owners where I live won't bet on a movie without car chases, guns, shooting, war, all sorts of violence, or juvenile, senseless humor, or mainstream sports. Perhaps a little thriller/horror/sci-fi/blockbuster (Titanic, JFK) might seep through. The sad thing is they may be right. A movie devoid of the aforementioned criteria might lose money here."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31064,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-04-10","keywords":"boyfriend girlfriend relationship,f word,doctor,blog,reference to mike nichols and elaine may","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi343846681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aging 1970s rocker Danny Collins can't give up his hard-living ways, but when his manager uncovers a 40-year-old undelivered letter written to him by John Lennon, he decides to change course and embarks on a heartfelt journey to rediscover his family, find true love, and begin a second act.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000906/","name":"Annette Bening"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004950/","name":"Jennifer Garner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0485757/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

Wiera is a beautiful and well-trained agent of the former KGB, sent to Poland to steal the young genius's potion.
