programme.title: SYFY Inside: Krypton - Die besten der Bösen
Tarantula
programme.desc: Als der Geschäftsführer Blake Creighton (Michael Therriault) eines Morgens tot in seiner Wohnung aufgefunden wird, wird der Fall an Detective Jules Dover (Lisa Marcos) und ihre Partnerin, die virtuelle Intelligenz Asha (Harveen Sandhu), übergeben. Die ersten Befunde zeigen eindeutig, dass die Todesursache Strangulation gewesen sein muss. Doch Detective Dover und Asha finden keinerlei Hinweise auf Einwirkung von außen. Es scheint, als wäre Creighton ermordet worden, ohne vom Täter auch nur berührt worden zu sein. Syfy zeigt alle 10 Episoden von Halcyon in der Spielfilmfassung.

programme.title: Vabank
Vabank
programme.desc:
Vabank: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Ewa Szykulska. Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leaving the jail he learns that his friend with whom he played in the jazz band has been murdered by the same guy - now a bank president - who sent him to prison. Kramer hopes to keep Kwinto's mouth shut by paying him off, but at the same time he hires a paid gun to kill him. Meanwhile, some young, petty crooks hearing that Kwinto is free want to join forces with him for a job. Kwinto, employing a retired professional and two young admirers, pulls his last job to get even with Kramer..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083271/","name":"Vabank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1NjhiNGYtN2U3MS00NjBkLWE3MGMtYWZjMTVmY2RlZTMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leav","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083271/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Polish The Sting"","reviewBody":"This is a debut movie from Juliusz Machulski , Polish director who is in Poland often called "Polish Spielberg" . He specialize in making comedies and "Vabank" is one of his best movies. It's a movie about con artists set in Warsaw in the 30's , before World War II.

The movie was made in the 80's in Poland during the communism , so the budget wasn't too big and the art-direction might look a little cheap for modern audiences . It's the script that is the star of movie . Full of Polish brisk humor and many small twists it's a pleasure to watch . The final is really surprising . It's also interesting that main hero is played by Jan Machulski father of the director and that the opening credits appear after 7 minutes of the movie.

Add to that a good direction , professional acting (good Jan Machulski as the hero , great Leonard Pietraszak as the villain) , elegant and catchy music by Henryk Kuźniar and a lot of charm – "Vabank" is must see for all movie lovers .

I give it 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4256,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1982-03-01","keywords":"ex convict,frame up,one word title,october 1934,jeweler","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0083271, Title: Vabank, --- Description: Vabank: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Ewa Szykulska. Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leaving the jail he learns that his friend with whom he played in the jazz band has been murdered by the same guy - now a bank president - who sent him to prison. Kramer hopes to keep Kwinto's mouth shut by paying him off, but at the same time he hires a paid gun to kill him. Meanwhile, some young, petty crooks hearing that Kwinto is free want to join forces with him for a job. Kwinto, employing a retired professional and two young admirers, pulls his last job to get even with Kramer..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083271/","name":"Vabank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1NjhiNGYtN2U3MS00NjBkLWE3MGMtYWZjMTVmY2RlZTMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leav","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083271/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun","dateCreated":"2013-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Polish The Sting"","reviewBody":"This is a debut movie from Juliusz Machulski , Polish director who is in Poland often called "Polish Spielberg" . He specialize in making comedies and "Vabank" is one of his best movies. It's a movie about con artists set in Warsaw in the 30's , before World War II.

The movie was made in the 80's in Poland during the communism , so the budget wasn't too big and the art-direction might look a little cheap for modern audiences . It's the script that is the star of movie . Full of Polish brisk humor and many small twists it's a pleasure to watch . The final is really surprising . It's also interesting that main hero is played by Jan Machulski father of the director and that the opening credits appear after 7 minutes of the movie.

Add to that a good direction , professional acting (good Jan Machulski as the hero , great Leonard Pietraszak as the villain) , elegant and catchy music by Henryk Kuźniar and a lot of charm – "Vabank" is must see for all movie lovers .

I give it 8/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4256,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1982-03-01","keywords":"ex convict,frame up,one word title,october 1934,jeweler","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"],"duration":"PT1H48M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vabank II, czyli riposta
Vabank II, czyli riposta
programme.desc:
Vabank II, czyli riposta: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Bronislaw Wroclawski. Convict Kramer manages to escape from prison. Before leaving for Switzerland, he wants to take revenge on Kwinto, the man who sent him to jail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0090246/","name":"Vabank II, czyli riposta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTg5ODcyYTEtM2U5OS00YjNkLWE5MzMtODcwZjU5ZjI5NmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Convict Kramer manages to escape from prison. Before leaving for Switzerland, he wants to take revenge on Kwinto, the man who sent him to jail.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0090246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Routine sequel","reviewBody":""Vabank 2" is a sequel that follows the formula of the first movie . It's not strange that in the end the movie isn't as half surprising or funny as the original . It's more predictable and there aren't any interesting new characters . It seems that Machulski (writer and director ) has run out of ideas . The movie is quite surprising in the first 40 minutes . Later , it goes into standard and predictable territory : a bait , a trap and a repeat of the final of first movie.

Still it's an OK sequel . There are some good jokes here . The music is as elegant and catchy as before and acting is still good . I would only complain about performance of Jacek Chmielnik (Moks) . He's overacting so much that I was annoyed every time he was on screen. In his defense he signs really well the Vabank song that appears here. The song is really cool and to be honest that's the only really new element here.

It's no match for the first one , but still a watchable sequel. By the way , IMDb is wrong. This movie was made in 1984 , not 1985.I give it 5/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1985-05-06","keywords":"switzerland,safecracker,nazi,gang,border guard","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644038/","name":"Urs Odermatt"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pulkownik Kwiatkowski
Pułkownik Kwiatkowski
programme.desc: Pulkownik Kwiatkowski: Directed by Kazimierz Kutz. With Marek Kondrat, Renata Dancewicz, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Adam Ferency. In 1945, military doctor Andrzej Kwiatkowski pretends to be a communist army colonel in order to save innocent people from Stalinist imprisonment and to get the heart of the girl he's in love with." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114204/","name":"Pulkownik Kwiatkowski","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmIwMmEwMWItZDIzZi00MGUxLWJjY2EtMzM2YmJiYzkzNWUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1945, military doctor Andrzej Kwiatkowski pretends to be a communist army colonel in order to save innocent people from Stalinist imprisonment and to get the heart of the girl he's in love with.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wkbrostow"},"dateCreated":"2021-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A gem of a film","reviewBody":"The story presented in the film is apparently related to true events. With the Soviet Army stationed in Poland, innocent people are imprisoned by local party bosses. Military physician with the rank of captain puts on the uniform of a colonel of the communist equivalent of the Military Police. He, his neighbor Krysia (a nickname for Krystyna) and sergeant Dudek similarly dressed as a MP lieutenant visit various cities as inspectors to see how the political prisoners are treated. In Warsaw they would be recognized for what they are, but in some other cities they succeed in liberating a number of innocent people as not dangerous to the socialist regime. Given the subject, this is not a comedy, but it has a number of comedy-like sequences.\n\nMarek Kondrat as the false colonel, Renata Dancewicz as Krysia and Zbigniew Zamachowski as the false lieutenant are all outstanding actors and play very convincingly. See this film if you can.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":850,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Adventure","Comedy","History"],"datePublished":"1996-05-10","keywords":"pretending to be someone else,polish military,post world war two,military uniform,year 1945","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464945/","name":"Marek Kondrat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0199164/","name":"Renata Dancewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476591/","name":"Kazimierz Kutz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086499/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118874/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824046/","name":"Jerzy Stefan Stawinski"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku
Szczęśliwego Nowego Jorku
programme.desc: Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku: Directed by Janusz Zaorski. With Boguslaw Linda, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Janusz Gajos, Cezary Pazura. The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120261/","name":"Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI3YzhjYzYtOGUzNy00MDdiLWEwNzMtYjU5NDc0YzY2NDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tadeusz-luksusowyjacht"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best","reviewBody":"The story follows a group of people from the country in the east. They lived their lives, regular, gray, everyday existence. Now, one day somebody decided to change the world, to make it better place. So the lives of our group have changed. The morning was still morning, evening was evening but somehow the rest was different. So they had to find a new place to live. They went west, to the place of eternal happiness and beauty. But when they get there, it turned out that the "paradise" was just as gray, dirty, stinky as their world.\n\nSo, if you ever had to leave your country looking for better life, just because somebody decided that old is bad and new is good, see this movie! But !! If you live your life just like coca cola commercial - thinking that polar bears play joyfully with seals - I dare you, do not! It is simply The Best movie I ever saw. Acting, screenplay, dialogs - top notch, life itself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-09-26","keywords":"masturbation,american dream,emigration","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301515/","name":"Janusz Gajos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0714981/","name":"Edward Redlinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vabank
Vabank
programme.desc:
Vabank: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Ewa Szykulska. Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leaving the jail he learns that his friend with whom he played in the jazz band has been murdered by the same guy - now a bank president - who sent him to prison. Kramer hopes to keep Kwinto's mouth shut by paying him off, but at the same time he hires a paid gun to kill him. Meanwhile, some young, petty crooks hearing that Kwinto is free want to join forces with him for a job. Kwinto, employing a retired professional and two young admirers, pulls his last job to get even with Kramer..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083271/","name":"Vabank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1NjhiNGYtN2U3MS00NjBkLWE3MGMtYWZjMTVmY2RlZTMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leav","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083271/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Polish The Sting"","reviewBody":"This is a debut movie from Juliusz Machulski , Polish director who is in Poland often called "Polish Spielberg" . He specialize in making comedies and "Vabank" is one of his best movies. It's a movie about con artists set in Warsaw in the 30's , before World War II.

The movie was made in the 80's in Poland during the communism , so the budget wasn't too big and the art-direction might look a little cheap for modern audiences . It's the script that is the star of movie . Full of Polish brisk humor and many small twists it's a pleasure to watch . The final is really surprising . It's also interesting that main hero is played by Jan Machulski father of the director and that the opening credits appear after 7 minutes of the movie.

Add to that a good direction , professional acting (good Jan Machulski as the hero , great Leonard Pietraszak as the villain) , elegant and catchy music by Henryk Kuźniar and a lot of charm – "Vabank" is must see for all movie lovers .

I give it 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4256,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1982-03-01","keywords":"ex convict,frame up,one word title,october 1934,jeweler","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vabank II, czyli riposta
Vabank II, czyli riposta
programme.desc:
Vabank II, czyli riposta: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Bronislaw Wroclawski. Convict Kramer manages to escape from prison. Before leaving for Switzerland, he wants to take revenge on Kwinto, the man who sent him to jail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0090246/","name":"Vabank II, czyli riposta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTg5ODcyYTEtM2U5OS00YjNkLWE5MzMtODcwZjU5ZjI5NmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Convict Kramer manages to escape from prison. Before leaving for Switzerland, he wants to take revenge on Kwinto, the man who sent him to jail.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0090246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Routine sequel","reviewBody":""Vabank 2" is a sequel that follows the formula of the first movie . It's not strange that in the end the movie isn't as half surprising or funny as the original . It's more predictable and there aren't any interesting new characters . It seems that Machulski (writer and director ) has run out of ideas . The movie is quite surprising in the first 40 minutes . Later , it goes into standard and predictable territory : a bait , a trap and a repeat of the final of first movie.

Still it's an OK sequel . There are some good jokes here . The music is as elegant and catchy as before and acting is still good . I would only complain about performance of Jacek Chmielnik (Moks) . He's overacting so much that I was annoyed every time he was on screen. In his defense he signs really well the Vabank song that appears here. The song is really cool and to be honest that's the only really new element here.

It's no match for the first one , but still a watchable sequel. By the way , IMDb is wrong. This movie was made in 1984 , not 1985.I give it 5/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1985-05-06","keywords":"switzerland,safecracker,nazi,gang,border guard","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644038/","name":"Urs Odermatt"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Seksmisja
Seksmisja
programme.desc:
Seksmisja: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Wieslaw Michnikowski, Jerzy Stuhr, Olgierd Lukaszewicz, Dorota Stalinska. Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088083/","name":"Seksmisja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FjYTg3ZGUtZGMzMS00ZjQ3LTgxYjYtYzgzOTRjZDQ5MDY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MTIwODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088083/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"varberg"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cultic Polish sci-fi satire","reviewBody":"I must admit that I haven't seen many movies made in Poland (shame, but not many are played here...), but this one is a real gem, which achieved cult status in this region.

The story is about two men who are hibernated for 3 years for showing "the victory of mankind over time", but wake up 53 years later in society ruled by women. Men are extinct, all living men were killed by a bomb and the surviving women have to leave under the Earth's surface in complexes. One of the women says: "Encounter with men are areal". Our heroes don't panic however... they have only one goal: re-establishing somehow the old regime. Not an easy task, considering they are the only men alive, surrounded by man-hating ("man-eating"), fanatic women whose goal is either to naturalize or to kill them.

One can't forget that this movie was made in 1984 when communism was in its place and didn't seem to melt yet. Nowadays I wonder a bit that it was allowed to show in the cinemas, because this movie is a perfect satire of any totaliarist regime (including communism) and blind fanaticism. There is very subtle humor between the lines and this humor is what makes this movie a cult movie. However serious the theme, the movie catches the mood and the movements so easily and with such wit that you can't help but laugh. Making fun of something is the best way to criticize it and Seksmisja is a perfect example.

This movie is highly recommended for anyone in the world. Seeing it only once isn't enough... to get the whole idea and the subtler humor, you have to watch it several times. If you want to enjoy it fully, get the original Polish version with subtitles.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0088083, Title: Seksmisja, --- Description: Seksmisja: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Wieslaw Michnikowski, Jerzy Stuhr, Olgierd Lukaszewicz, Dorota Stalinska. Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088083/","name":"Seksmisja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FjYTg3ZGUtZGMzMS00ZjQ3LTgxYjYtYzgzOTRjZDQ5MDY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MTIwODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088083/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"varberg","dateCreated":"2004-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cultic Polish sci-fi satire","reviewBody":"I must admit that I haven't seen many movies made in Poland (shame, but not many are played here...), but this one is a real gem, which achieved cult status in this region.

The story is about two men who are hibernated for 3 years for showing "the victory of mankind over time", but wake up 53 years later in society ruled by women. Men are extinct, all living men were killed by a bomb and the surviving women have to leave under the Earth's surface in complexes. One of the women says: "Encounter with men are areal". Our heroes don't panic however... they have only one goal: re-establishing somehow the old regime. Not an easy task, considering they are the only men alive, surrounded by man-hating ("man-eating"), fanatic women whose goal is either to naturalize or to kill them.

One can't forget that this movie was made in 1984 when communism was in its place and didn't seem to melt yet. Nowadays I wonder a bit that it was allowed to show in the cinemas, because this movie is a perfect satire of any totaliarist regime (including communism) and blind fanaticism. There is very subtle humor between the lines and this humor is what makes this movie a cult movie. However serious the theme, the movie catches the mood and the movements so easily and with such wit that you can't help but laugh. Making fun of something is the best way to criticize it and Seksmisja is a perfect example.

This movie is highly recommended for anyone in the world. Seeing it only once isn't enough... to get the whole idea and the subtler humor, you have to watch it several times. If you want to enjoy it fully, get the original Polish version with subtitles.

programme.desc: Brunet wieczorowa pora: Directed by Stanislaw Bareja. With Krzysztof Kowalewski, Wojciech Pokora, Janina Traczykówna, Wieslaw Golas. Modest editor, has shipped his wife and kids for the weekend, and is trying to relax in his house at the outskirts of Warsaw. His quiet evening is only disturbed by the accidental forecast made by a Gypsy woman, that at evening time he will murder a mysterious brunet. He is trying to escape the destiny, but to no avail..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0074251/","name":"Brunet wieczorowa pora","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI2MjQzNjktMzM1Ny00NjJiLThkMjAtMmQ4YWFiNWZlZWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjIxMzk1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Modest editor, has shipped his wife and kids for the weekend, and is trying to relax in his house at the outskirts of Warsaw. His quiet evening is only disturbed by the accidental forecast made by a Gypsy woman, that at evening time ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0074251/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tml_pohlak_13"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"An entertaining comedy!","reviewBody":"A Polish editor sends away his wife and kids and is hoping for a peaceful weekend. His night passes uneventfully, until the lights fuse. As he fixes them, a Gypsy knocks at his window. She predicts, amongst other things, that he will kill a man with brown hair accidentally the next evening. The next day is filled with surprises, as each of the Gypsy's predictions come true. The hero becomes more and more uneasy. Then, the evening comes, and a knock sounds at his door. (But it is only two carol singers whom he pays money willingly.) After sending them away, he sits down, and as he is about to relax, he hears a noise. He looks up, and sees....\n\nThis is overall an amazing comedy, which is really entertaining. Szczęśliwego Nowego Jorku
programme.desc: Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku: Directed by Janusz Zaorski. With Boguslaw Linda, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Janusz Gajos, Cezary Pazura. The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120261/","name":"Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI3YzhjYzYtOGUzNy00MDdiLWEwNzMtYjU5NDc0YzY2NDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tadeusz-luksusowyjacht"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best","reviewBody":"The story follows a group of people from the country in the east. They lived their lives, regular, gray, everyday existence. Now, one day somebody decided to change the world, to make it better place. So the lives of our group have changed. The morning was still morning, evening was evening but somehow the rest was different. So they had to find a new place to live. They went west, to the place of eternal happiness and beauty. But when they get there, it turned out that the "paradise" was just as gray, dirty, stinky as their world.\n\nSo, if you ever had to leave your country looking for better life, just because somebody decided that old is bad and new is good, see this movie! But !! If you live your life just like coca cola commercial - thinking that polar bears play joyfully with seals - I dare you, do not! It is simply The Best movie I ever saw. Acting, screenplay, dialogs - top notch, life itself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-09-26","keywords":"masturbation,american dream,emigration","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301515/","name":"Janusz Gajos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0714981/","name":"Edward Redlinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="
